I called RIng and was told an update would be coming in 2 -3 weeks that would do this.  When I get it I'll upgrade this review. The camera picture is very clear.  It's easy to communicate through the camera.  Others tell me the voice is clear.  Works as it is presently designed. For now I have to remember to turn off and back on.  Otherwise I get numerous alerts and recordings when I and other move around in living room.
title: Need to turn off when at home

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Thomas L. Jamison
content: Was looking at replacing my garage door opener with a new opener with built in camera for the garage. It cost $299. Since the present opener was still fully functional, I decided to look at stand alone cameras. Since I already had a Ring Pro Door Bell w/camera, I looked at the Ring cameras first, and, never looked elsewhere. This $59 camera had everything I wanted. It fits my needs perfectly. I know if anyone enters the garage, and, can check from Ring app to make sure the garage door is closed before going to bed. Excellent value.
title: Great and Inexpensive Device.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: B Kirk
content: Highly recommend! Perfect for helping elderly folks stay in their own home, yet have a sense of security and safety. I bought this for my moms house. She lives less than 5 miles away from me, but I wanted to be able to check in on her when I was away from her house. This is amazing, simple for her to use, and allows me to even talk to her when she needs me.
title: A great gift for the senior citizen in your life, or for young families!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Laura Calamia
content: I am using this camera in an unusual way. I started caring for my ailing mother in January. As she slept a lot, I initially got a baby monitor so that I could hear when she woke up. A few months passed and Mom stopped calling out. I had to go in every half hour to check on her to see if she had woken up. This got old really fast. I started looking at baby camera's that were compatible with the monitor so that I could check on her that way.  They were in the $100+ for a single camera! My husband suggested this camera as he uses it at his office. At more than half the price savings, I jumped on it. I am so glad I did! It allows me to keep an eye on Mom PLUS, it gives my siblings the opportunity to check on her when they are not here. As for privacy, I love that I am able to move and/or rotate the camera whenever I need. It's one of the minor reasons I have not mounted it. The main reason I haven't mounted it is that I want Mom to be the focus so I have it set closer to her than a wall or ceiling would permit. Yes, I can mount it and zoom in on the app, but I didn't want that hassle. I have recently had to start to use the zoom and can say it works great. It lags for about 30 nanoseconds, but it focuses enough to see Mom breathing.
title: Bye bye baby cam

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ANNE
content: Nice little camera , good clear picture But , it is not compatible with the app on my MacBook Pro, can only view with my iPhone app , also if you are not home and there is a power outage it did not automatically reconnect with my WiFi , when I spoke with customer support at ring I was told I would have to push the reset button , but I am now 1600 miles away and will not be there for 5 months so it is just wall decor now and so is my ring floodlight camera , maybe a burglar will press the reset for me .
title: Power outage failure to reconnect to WiFi

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SGS
content: The hardware is good but the software needs improvement.  It is small and nice looking.  But, this annoying device sends a notification every time someone moves in the covered area of your house.  You can shut it off - but then you need to remember to turn it back on.  The device needs to be incorporate geofencing - so that it only sends alarms when you are outside the home.  Since I have a Ring Doorbell, it sends the same alerts and notifications that the doorbell sends. It seems to me you should have a different alarm and that the list of alerts on your phone should be separate from other Ring Devices.
title: An Annoying Little Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: LuchaKabra
content: Works really well and can link to alarm system. Every time the alarm is triggered upon entry the camera starts recording. Night vision is pretty good can be a little better with resolution. Camera does a lot of clicking noise when watching tv due to motion. Overall really good camera especially for the price! If your frightened about the recent ring camera hacks be sure to turn on 2-step verification just in case. So far so good!
title: Ring Camera Works Well For The Price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: D
content: I installed in my father's house because I was needing to have homeheath come in to take care of him. I have now had to fire 1 worker, caught her going all the drawers in the house. The next girl was using Dad as a bank so, she is gone and hopefully doesn't come around again. So, these cameras are fantastic for security and checking in on the elderly. I was able to send the video to the homehealth company so, they could fire the girl for cause.
title: able to check in on elderlt parents homehealrh ❤

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: michael
content: I bought 3 of these. 2 work great, one is too dark at night. I set them up in a vacation home and cannot just go back to troubleshoot. I will buy another to replace it next time I go, but my advice to anyone considering these is to be sure they are working perfectly as soon as you set it up. I had them set to not record when we are home, so I never checked the night vision. Again, 2 worked fine but one does not see anything at night.
title: 2 worked great, 1 has defect.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: koats
content: If this product worked and had this price I’d be in love. We went through 2 units in less than a month. Bought it to monitor a new dog with some health problems. The camera worked for about a week each time and then started to disconnect from wireless which required it to be setup again. It would last for a day and then lose connection again, eventually it got down to a few hours and then I couldn’t reconnect or reset it at all. I contacted Ring support and the only help they could give was to return it since it was still in the return window. No amount of troubleshooting was able to get it working again. If they could fix the issues with these $60 per camera would be a great value, till then you are stuck spending considerably more on one of their higher models.
title: Poor reliability and a good cause of e-waste

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: shannon a
content: These cameras are off line more than than they are connected. If I hadn’t waited too long I would return them. Everything else stays connected so it is these cameras. What a hassle to constantly have to re scan the little barcode multiple times a day and rename each camera. Garbage,
title: Garbage

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mr.MO
content: Product was what I was expecting, this is my 4th ring product that I own. Currently have the doorbell, outside floodlight camera x2, and just a motion detector floodlight. So before purchasing I knew what I was getting into. Overall am not disappointed. I was forced to set up the indoor stick up camera as a baby monitoring camera due to some discrepancies with the nanny and to say the least it has been working flawless for that job. It’s made a great baby monitor. Connect in real time via voice and live camera footage. Night vision could be a hair better, but to say the least it does a great job especially for the price. I’d recommend any of the for mentioned products. Seems to be sturdy and of good quality. Def like a lot.
title: Ring Cams works for a variety of applications

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ronny
content: Our Fourth Ring Product for our Beach Home.  First of all, my wife thinks I am a Techno Genius since I insalled them my self and too one try for each product and even set up the app for her phone.  As far as quality I have one Outside Camera that not just survived Hurricanes we were getting a GREAT BIRDS EYE VIEW OF THE STORM while we were sitting nice and dry 500 miles away.  RING IS HURRICANE PROOF
title: In case of an emergency  ALWAYS USE RING

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jessica Wollweber- Maley
content: It’s a good video camera for the price I paid. It is very good about spotting any motion detected however the two way talk is complete garbage. I can hear what they are saying through the app on my phone but when I go to talk back through the camera it is so muffled you can barely make out one word. It does it’s purpose or where it’s at in my house but I don’t think I would purchase this exact camera again I would maybe get an upgraded one with Ring
title: Good camera but bad microphone

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: trjk
content: So far I've been very happy with these cameras.  Image quality is excellent and they're easy to access and configure.  Would be nice to have an "only capture during the time frame" option to cut down on clips in high traffic areas.  The current options to mitigate this aren't very robust.  I only need certain areas to record during the night or when triggered by a linked device and I don't want to have to change "modes" to make that happen.
title: Image quality is excellent, Ring has come a long way

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: MaggieA
content: Works absolutely great. My door bell only faces another wall. So I decided to try this indoor camera instead which sits in a window looking at the walkway coming up to the door.  I am able to know when I get an Amazon delivery.  The only negative it activates notification when light is on in the room in the evening and my reflection is in the window as I move around. Since I don’t spend time in that room after dark, it does not bother me.
title: Wide range and no false alarms.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jon I Dunham
content: This camera was super easy to setup, it talks you through it, and the app integration was great.  Replaced a cloud cam with this, and the size difference isn't a reason to buy this, but it definitely is smaller. Just wish this came in black.
title: Super easy setup, and great picture quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kerri Ross
content: I have only had these for 2 days but so far so good. I installed the RING app and charged the cameras and the rest is history. Super easy to install. I mainly just got these to watch my animals during the day while at work and it catches all movement and has been fun to watch them. Great at night too, catches the eyes glowing when its dark and during the day the quality of the photo/video is great. Wish i had bought these sooner! Worth the money! One upstairs, one downstairs and they pair up on the same app nicely.
title: Great Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Laura Gonzalez
content: Don't purchase this for live view.  It is occasional at the most.  You can see what did happen but not what IS happening. ****UPDATE****  While I THOUGHT it didn't work for live view like a baby monitor, I was totally wrong!  After posting this review I promptly received an email from Ring support.  We scheduled a day a time to talk and I told him what we were experiencing.  Turns out....it's our sporadic, sometimes weak wifi.  He recommended the Eero system.  This isn't something I would say that everyone who purchases the ring cameras would need to also invest in.  We were needed to invest in a signal booster anyway!  We chose to purchase the 3-pack system (one main, two rooms) and all of our devices are working so much better!  Thank you Kale from Ring support!!  He was so helpful, understanding and kind and told me to contact him in the future if I had any concerns or questions.  We have also purchased the basic plan for saving the videos.  We use ours for my elderly step-mother who suffers from dementia and, besides being alerted to movement, I can see how well she slept or how many times she got up during the night.  It helps in explaining moods and disposition the next day.
title: ***UPDATED*****  Not For Live View

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KTC
content: We just wanted a camera in our personal office and it is fine for that.  There is no free saved video like some other brands .. you have a trial period of, I think, 30 days and then you either pay or no saved footage.  But...it's only $3.00 a month...so worth it .... We have Ring at our home too BUT ... just know that you pay a separate fee for different addresses ... Our office camera we have to pay for and then our home system is a separate fee. But I like the product and they have reasonable fees.
title: Its fine for our personal office

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Diana
content: I love the quality of the product, however the only downside is that you have to purchase a monthly subscription to get the features of the camera such as recording videos when there is motion and to review old videos that the camera captured which sucks because without the subscription i cant know if there is someone at home unless i go to the app and manually open the camera
title: Pretty good but have to purchase monthly subscription

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Noel6
content: On a scale of 1-5 the setup was a 4 for me.  The pics are clear and the vids sufficient with little delay.  How ever this also depends on your WiFi signal.  I had to upgrade my megs and I had to move my modem and router closer, which was fine I needed to do this anyway.  However, if I am away from my home I get nothing.  I call Cust sup and was told to download an app called “ Rapid Ring“.  Don’t know why it’s just a secondary app to activate your cams.  Don’t know what to do?  Too lat for returns.  🙁
title: Don’t get too hyped until the fat lady sings.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shshshsh
content: Mode keeps changing on you, unable to connect to live view, just when you needed it, it hasn't recorded, cloud software is unreliable also. I'm stuck with ring products now, we'll probably buy more. But if you are a newcomer looks somewhere else. EDIT: since I wrote my previous review, this product has improved considerably,  though disconnects are still there occasionally but not nearly as much as it used to be before... giving four star.
title: Useful

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bailey Ann
content: I didn’t know I was purchasing an indestructible camera, yet here we are. My 10 month old puppy got a hold of this camera multiple times. He visibly chewed up the cord, left teethmarks throughout the entire product, and caused a crack within the lens. However, even after the damage was caused, the quality of video and sound are still great. The crack inside of the lens doesn’t appear to have impacted the video quality at all. Very impressed
title: Indestructible

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RYAN R JOYCE
content: It’s a great camera and works just like the doorbell.  Smooth and seamless in the same app.  My only gripe is that we want to use it as a baby monitor and the live feed only stays on for 10 minutes until it times out.  Then we have to open it again.  So we decided to use our old sound-only baby monitor to keep us informed of the babies sounds and if-when the baby noises alarm us we just say “Alexa, show us the kids room” and on any of our Amazon Devices “even on our TV with Fire Cube” the live video of our baby is shown and we can rest assured he is ok.  Great picture and so much better quality than our video baby monitor this is replacing.
title: Can work as baby monitor and great quality!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: remssemac
content: I purchased this for my living room and I am able to see the door way, all the way into the kitchen. I just wanted a safeguard for the already purchased ring door bell that I installed. Setting this product up was super simple and took maybe 5 minutes. So far, I've managed to catch my husbands eating habits which are crazy and also my lazy Bulldog trying to get into the Christmas stockings. Overall this is living up to the quality I expected from Ring. The video is super clear for such a small device.
title: Great Picture Quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alexander Nussbaum
content: Overall it's solid ring camera, build quality is a little less then the full-sized camera. But at half the price that's to be expected and completely acceptable. The one real complaint that I do have is what the power cable, it seems that they definitely saved some money with this cord. Very cheap feeling, kind of looks like hanging from dollar store. Hopefully they will address this on the second generation. Other than that another good if not great product from ring, with a excellent price point, I know I will definitely be ordering at least one or two more.
title: Great for the price.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: William R. Teetsell
content: have to replace all my NetCams  this $60 cam can not turn of IR for the one cam I put in window: Still not able to view live from Laptop with Ring App downloaded from windows store reviews are 2 out of 5 over 300 reviews I am changing my rating to 5 stars, Kale with executive customer service was great with the quirks, after using Belkin NetCams for 7 years with never a problem (note) end of life date was 6/30/20 This camera is the best alternative After doing this review the ring app for windows is a mess, viewing live then signed out and have to uninstall and reinstall no wonder the reviews are 2.2  the RING APP get - 1 Star !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
title: can not turn off IR

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jody G.
content: When we first received the ring camera I was unable to get it connected. After going through troubleshooting I was told that we would have to order a replacement. Something was wrong with the Wi-Fi direct on the unit. Once we receive the replacement it connected fairly quickly.  For the most part the ring camera does not disconnect from the internet and is available to look at when you need it. The only issue that I have is at night the night vision is not quite as sharp as I would like it to be. I have several other ring floodlight cameras outside and the night vision on those is quite a bit better. Overall it's a decent indoor camera.
title: Stays connected, works with Alexa.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: sandra wolfe
content: Just purchased 3 Ring Indoor Cameras to help monitor activity in my home.  The cameras setup was pretty easy and the video quality and monitoring features were very good.  The 1-star rating is due to the way Ring insults our intelligence on their app.  They have a bright orange banner reminding you 24/7 about their Ring Protect Plans and even if you cancel the trial or notify Ring that you are not interested in this service, the banner remains. I followed their support team instructions and canceled the trial, installed and reinstalled the app but the orange banner is back with a different message. "Your videos are not being saved. Learn more about the Ring Protect Plans." That was explained to me when I canceled the trial and I acknowledged that I understood.  And yet, Ring decides I need to be reminded of that fact every time I open their app.  Also, the banner interferes with the function of the app. If you want to delete all events from a specific device, the banner blocks the "Delete All" button.  Had I known this before I purchased the Ring Cameras, I would have gone with a competitor's product. Ring don't insult our intelligence! It is ok the initially remind consumers of service offerings, we don't need to be reminded every time we open your app once we tell you we are not interested.
title: Good product but insults consumer intelligence on the app

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: James Jarrett
content: Wonderful! I finally get ahold of the indoor camera, it connects just fine, sets up great and works for a whole ass 5 hours and then it decides to not connect to my wifi (which works great, everything else connected) won't even do a reset and on top of that won't even do a hard reset. So great! What a pile of absolute garbage. I'll be returning it if ring doesn't answer there phones soon. Which by the way I love that. Waiting forever on the phones, spending what's now been 30 minutes messing with this garbage camera. Im having a wonderful night. Just wonderful.
title: Buy anything else instead.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tritium
content: Turns out one of the camera included in this 2-pack has a faulty infrared light. Night vision is rendered worthless due to this. I have several other Ring cameras without issues, so this was a bit disappointing to come across. Other features work as well as I expect them to. Downside is the defective unit is 300-miles away, so making a trip to grab it and package it for a return would be a bit impossible currently.
title: One camera has a defective infrared light - no night vision

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jess
content: I was happy to get this camera because we have had a problem with people coming onto our property and we needed a smaller camera for our patio area. Well we first plugged it in and set it up in the house to try it out and not even 24 hours we lost signal to the WiFi and it took forever to reconnect, we moved it closer to the internet box and left it for a day and it lost connection several times. I really wanted to like this camera, the picture was great though.
title: Won’t stay connected

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kdawg
content: First ring product. My husband and I love it. I set it up, so easy!  Good quality camera! Love the size! My husband even talked to me through the camera when he was at his parent’s house and it was easy to hear him! Great price. Really happy with this product. I didn’t have any issues that anyone else stated. Only complaint is the app still picks up my dog as a motion alert even when on detect humans only, but that’s OK.
title: Great camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kevin Nixon
content: I can’t really complain about the video quality other than I wish the night vision was a little better but It will do for the price. I will complain a bit about the motion detection. When I set it to people only mode it will not even go off when I walk around my yard so I have to set it for everything to make it go off and with my sensitivity all the way down, it goes off constantly for the shadows on the ground or the wind barely blowing. I use this for outdoor even tho it’s indoor only but my porch is covered and should be fine.
title: People only mode doesn’t work on mine.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Matt C
content: Very small camera compared to the other Ring cameras. Easy to set up and use. Video quality is good, not perfect HD quality but it’s pretty clear. My only issue I have, is that it doesn’t detect motion as good as my other ring cameras. There is a noticeable delay on when it starts to record motion. I have other Ring Stick up cams battery powered outside my home and the motion detection works a lot better than the indoor one. Other than that, I like this camera.
title: Nice camera for the price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Michelle Poland
content: I absolutely love this! I reviewed a lot of security cameras before I purchased and kept coming back to this one. I am so glad I did. I leave this in my craft/youtube filming room which has equipment I need to keep an eye on. I purchased this after my very expensive photography camera grew legs and walked off and “nobody” did it. I have it set where “nobody” can see it so if they ever choose to visit again I will know immediately.
title: Definitely get this

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sean Sellars
content: Full disclosure; I have a lot of Ring stuff. I ordered a couple of these cameras and wrote a review saying the video was great but the audio had issues. BUT... after tremendous customer support, I mean just amazing, they sent me new cameras and I went through the reinstall and everything is great now. I don't know what happened. Maybe I messed something up. But seriously, whether you like Ring as a product or not, their customer service is not to be questioned. Just great! ps- you won't find better cameras at this price level.
title: Amended Review... so happy.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: MBCI
content: Major problem with this camera is lack of geofencing support. The only way to arm and disarm is manually. The camera is always recording and sending notifications unless you open the app and change status which means now i have to remember to open the app to arm when I leave. Going back to my arlo camera which uses geofencing to arm/disarm automatically
title: Lack of geofencing major problem.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Pudknocker71
content: While the idea of pointing out a window is supported, design has faults. Both blue led and infrared  leds shine back into camera. Camera is totally blinded by it's own light. In settings they have the option to turn off infrared but the blue led remains. Taping over the led a cleared up the picture.  However no motion is detected at night without the infrared.
title: Not good for windows...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Menephta Fernandez
content: We call this little camera judge Judy when the kids like to Fight and blame each other she is the one to put the end to all the fighting. Definitely need one of these if you don’t have one fight and blame each other she is the one to put the end to all the fighting. Definitely need one of these if you don’t have one
title: Judge Judy

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mike Lerner
content: I am going to recommend against this device because the app has an annoying and obtrusive, AND CHEESY, advertising banner across the bottom of the screen. That's so freeware. It's totally insulting to a user who paid full price  to be constantly hectored to buy another service that is not an essential part of the device. Technology companies that design their systems to intrude on users time and attention need to be shunned in order to punish them for bad design
title: Intrusive banner in app ruins enjoyment of the system

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Magicsmom
content: Worthless.  Cable always Popping out....causing disconnects!  Have to re-connect—nuisance!  God help if we were overseas...would be useless.  Trashing it,  too annoying to use. I finally disconnected it and tried to hammer it to death.  Can't possibly set it up.  $60 down the toilet of Amazon.  Thanks a LOT, Amazon.
title: Garbage!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Grits
content: For 10 months it worked fine, I unplugged it from the wall to move a chair, and now it won't reconnect to WiFi. It doesn't even power on. And yes the outlet has power. Very disappointed. Ring customer service called me and set up an appointment to discuss the problems however the appointment date and time came and went and I never heard back from them. So I'll be deducting one star for lack of customer service.
title: Worked, until it didn't.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jack
content: These cameras are great for monitoring the inside of your home while you're away.  I have several placed around our home and only activate them when we're away.  We have one strategically placed to monitor our dog in his crate when we have to leave him at home for a bit by himself. Like all other Ring cameras, as long as you have a strong Wi-Fi network in your house, they work great.
title: I have several of these and they work well.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joel H.
content: Don’t make the assumption that because Ring is owned by Amazon they have a decent app to control these cameras. I unfortunately made that assumption. The app does not allow you to set a schedule of when not to record. You can prevent it from sending you audible phone alerts. However when you open the app it will have hundreds of alerts /recordings of you when you are home, even when you don’t want to be recorded. I don’t care about the privacy part however every time I go into the app there are hundreds of two minute recordings of when I am home. You literally can’t stop this unless you manually stop the recording every day. Why you can’t schedule when you want it to record (via motion detection) is ridiculous. It’s hard to find a recording you want to see when it’s swamped by hundreds of recordings you could care less about.
title: Terrible App, Don’t buy until better

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Volker72
content: Great little camera with one downside that caused me to return 2 of 4. I was going to replace all 4 of my amazon cloud cams but had to keep the 2 cloud cams I use as monitors for the kids. Unlike the Amazon cloud cam, this Ring camera records video when you “Go Live” and it times out (stops displaying video) at the 10 min mark. We like to have the baby camera up on our Amazon Show or Cell phone at night, but  having to restart the Ring camera every 10 mins is no good.
title: Great Security Cam, Bad Baby Monitor Cam

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Anthony F.
content: Brand new and didn’t work. Called ring support who I spoke with for 25 minutes, 16 of them asking the same question. Finally realized it was the cable. 5-7 business days for a replacement ... I’ll send it back to amazon.
title: Broken upon arrival

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alloftheabove
content: We have 300mb download and 100mb upload. Our wifi is 10 feet from this camera. It's still super slow. Just like the front door, it takes way too long to register that there is motion. Well, it does capture the motion but it doesn't actually load until that motion is long gone. There's not a lot of help there. Granted, we'll still keep it and for the $10 a month you can still see whats going on and it records it. However, I wish it was a lot faster and the app was better.
title: Really wish this camera has better connection to our wifi

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kym Brunner
content: I didn't want to install something on the outside of my house, so I keep this camera inside and aim it out the window to record what's going on at all of my doorways. If there is light in the room sometimes it affects the camera, but there are settings you can change to make it work better.
title: Works great as a doorbell camera!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Greg
content: There is a lot packed into these little cameras.  The picture quality is great and the sounds is good (No one has yet mastered crystal clear sound.).  The motion sensors are customizable which allows you to adjust the detection zones into your specific areas.  I was able to get them operating within a few minutes.  Lastly, Ring's $10/month cloud subscription for 30 days of unlimited cameras/video storage AND alarm monitoring is the best deal you'll find.
title: Fantastic Picture - Easy to Setup

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: D. Byrd
content: Not sure what this company was thinking when they decided to add cameras to their doorbell.  You CANNOT disable notifications on all of the cameras in your house without disabling each on independently.  Ridiculous !!!!!  Who wants to get notifications when you move around in your house.  Every other system you look at or use has a home and an away mode that can be quickly set !!!!  Mine are going back to AMAZON.  Had to door bell too long but am looking for an alternative for that now.
title: Cannot disable notifications on all cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kate Heyde
content: I already had the Ring outdoor camera so setup for this took less than 5 minutes. So easy and already working well. It's a nice small camera that we are using as a baby monitor so I can watch anywhere, anytime.
title: So happy with Ring

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: hipsfish
content: We are using this in conjunction with an Echo Show-5 as a security measure for my parent with Alzheimer’s Dementia. The camera does what it says so far, though it is quite sensitive and took some tweaking. I would encourage you to give it a try if you are looking for an easy, portable option for managing your loved ones security.
title: Elder cam!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Telsa
content: Purchase best to keep an eye on our dock and children. This is very smooth easy to store them on a shelf. What we like about it is that the picture is crystal clear and the motion detector doesn’t working. The only thing I don’t like is that even though we have great Internet service, it has already on two occasions start working we have had to plug and pug it in again for it to work.
title: It’s okay

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Phillygirl2460
content: I have an iphone so perhaps this isn't an issue with android phones.  But when you go to delete your videos, you click on Edit, and then try to select the radio buttons next to each video, alot of the times, if you don't hit it in the exact correct spot, the video ends up playing.  Then you have to go back and re-select the videos you already selected to delete.  Why in the world would you put the play button right next to the select button for when you are trying to delete-all?  Makes me wonder if the app designers use the product at all.  Come on, guys, fix this.
title: Camera and video quality is good, App is super-annoying

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Guest
content: The camera overall is decent but my biggest issue is it doesn't have location based functionality like my NestCam does. I don't want this thing on or recording when I'm home and I don't want to have to manually turn it off every time either.
title: Give me location based functionality!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Caitlin
content: This is our 4th order of ring products.  They are easy to use and plug right into the outlet. The app allows you to monitor all cameras from your cell phone.  When we go out of town for the weekend it is perfect to be able to keep an eye on our cats and watch our home. It is also great for when I have to leave my children or have sitters in the house. I would absolutely recommend this system.
title: Love the ring system!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sue252
content: What the advertising does not say is that you cannot review history without subscription even though camera is in your home. Any history is useless without subscription you cannot view. In my opinion this is a scam since these cameras are more expensive and still charging more to see the history in your home which is private why should I need their permission to see or pay to see it?
title: Subscriptions

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dylan Su
content: I was considering a ring stick up cam for a while for the garage, but was struggling to justify the price. This is the exact camera the family of products was missing in terms of price point and use-case.
title: Exactly the cam the Ring family of products was missing

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sms707
content: It’s a nice little camera but wish it came with a longer power cord since it’s not Poe compatible.  Was hoping to use it above my babies bassinet but power cord is a bit too short.
title: Nice but lacks POE which is a drag, short power cable.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: krbky
content: While I fully endorse the Ring Doorbell, I cannot say the same for the indoor camera. We have constant connection issues and 'Streaming Errors'. Also, it's either another $30 a year to keep footage or $100(!) for 'Up to 10 devices'. For reference, I have a 500mps router, 130mbps Download speed and 10mbps Upload. We have a "Smart Home" with 22 devices(including bulbs, plugs, and 5 Alexa devices) and none have these issues.  There is Zero reason for these connection issues other than the Ring hardware/software.
title: Will not connect reliably...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: PeJoGu
content: I set the camera up on my ring account. It had a beautiful picture. The camera died after less than TREE MINUTES! I tried to talk with ring customer service, but was disconnected after a fairly long chat and decided to return the product.
title: Camera died after three minutes.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jellybird
content: I have the Ring doorbell and the night vision is great.  The night vision on this webcam is extremely poor.  I will call customer service to see if there is a defect. Update:  I moved the webcam to another location in my house and for some reason the night vision is much better now.  I updated the rating based on the performance now.  Amazon customer service reached out but I never called them back.  Thank you anyways, Amazon.  You have great customer service.
title: Nice webcam

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jim St. John
content: I like them. We use them to keep an eye on our dog. However, support isn't great. There display red lights and I can't figure out what that means. There is conflicting info on the internet and nothing is consistent. Good product thought. Easy to install and work seamlessly. Only downside is that if you want to save footage from the camera you have to subscribe to Ring which too me is a joke and a ploy to steal money.
title: Work well and easy set up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Danny
content: It works excellent! It gives me peace of mind for when I travel and leave my apartment, since maintenance has the keys to enter and does so occasionally. It's small, compact, and easy to use/monitor from my phone. Since I live in a one bedroom apartment, it's perfect without having to buy a full security system. For those worried about the camera "spying" on you, I simply unplug it when I'm home. It's a must if you're a traveling small apartment owner.
title: Must have for small apartment owners!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Craig A Syphrit
content: I chose ring because I already owned a Ring Doorbell. I like the idea of only using one app. You can also have the camera “communicate” with your other Ring cameras. I will most likely add other Ring products. The only con is the cost for the monthly video subscription to save videos. I use mine with an Echo Show 8 to watch my kids when they play in the basement.
title: Goes great with Ring doorbell

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Billy R. Hulsey
content: Easy to setup, wide angle view, not good resolution but OK for what you need it for and that to see what is happening in room. Ties in easily with other Ring devices. Can control camera with your phone or tablet plus computer. We leave cameras off unless we are away from home and have Ring alarm on. If you forget to turn on before you leave home you can do so with your cell phone. Like Ring because it has cellular backup in case Intranet goes down and cloud storage.
title: Ring is Good

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Harlem153
content: Don't get me wrong camera works great I love it however the first one I purchased is still working I then ordered 2 more and once set up is completed just stops working . Supposedly I was told power was low but definitely both the case cameras is very sensitive . I will give it another try if not I'll find something else . And I realized someone hacked my email that was signed up with camera I suggest use a dummy email and not your personal email . Had my email for years and once I did the ring set up it ironically was hacked.  But overall camera isn't bad just they need to work on hacks and the blackouts on the cameracameras
title: Great product ! However power sucks and the hacks!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Fred
content: I like the design, video quality and integration with the Ring alarm. But there are 2 major issues with this camera: - there is no way to turn it Off completely. I disabled "live view" and "motion detection", but it's still On so it's a big privacy concern. - there is a constant clicking noise at night or in low light. I have 2 cameras, flashed with the latest firmware , and they both have the same issues.
title: Clicking noise and no way to completely turn it Off

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lisa Marie
content: This is great. Now I can keep an eye on my kids during the day while they are out of school and feel safe while we are all asleep at night. I didn't think I wanted an outdoor cam until using this guy. Now I want Ring cams everywhere! This would have been so helpful when I had jewelry stolen from my home and seen who broke my front gate while on vacation. My only complaint is there a few seconds of lag time but for $60 I am very happy.
title: Very happy!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Taylor
content: I get paranoid at night, hate the dark. The ring alerts me when there’s ANY a motion, tv, a simple arm movement anything within the range it can see automatically to your phone. I can replay the past day and I get alerts less than 8 seconds after any movement takes place. I feel more secure, I like how You can have the app on other devices too, my friends can always check up On me when they see movement notifications. Long cord is in the box with the ring DO NOT PURCHASE THE EXTENSION unless you need the cord to reach over 10 feet. The original cord is quite long (thankful). I feel more at ease when I’m home alone knowing that if anything were to happen I would know immediately and have the footage as well as my friends being able to see and do something as well.
title: Best decision ever

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: zznotop
content: Perfect for my needs. Yes there is a reflection thru the window at night and in direct sunlight but for my purposes excellent value easy to set up and control. Only con is the cord into the unit seems to fall out if not careful when moving, otherwise nice camera.  Update to above review.  After about a week the camera just stopped working.  Checked it’s health status via the app and was told the BATTERY was extremely low a possible cause of failure.  Called ring customer service which was most responsive and they are sending a new power cord. Perhaps the cord was not really making a good contact since it always seemed to fall out.  Stay tuned for further info as it occurs.
title: Window reflection and cord slippage/ update. Camera stopped working after about a week

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JDC
content: Very pleased with camera operation. Long time user of RING doorbell and very pleased with their products and support. Have two cameras strategically located in house and use like alarm system. Check when away and very pleased with clarity both day and night. Really like how RING allows for shaping the motion alert zone area. Turn off when home and on when away; no problems. So pleased that I am adding another to my network in the garage. Also love being a part of the RING neighborhood network in my community. Recommend!
title: Excellent product.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Donna H.
content: This is a pretty good little camera.  It works well and has good picture quality.  The only think I don't like is that it doesn't seem to do what I set it to do in the app.  I don't want it on all the time, so I set it to times when I would be at work or asleep.  But it's always on, unless I manually turn it off.  Other than that, the camera itself works well.
title: Works well

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Per
content: The quality of the picture is great.  The app interface is great.  I am comparing to 4 other camera systems and associated apps including your own companie's Blink solution.  What is not good is that the motion alert seems to trigger without any actual motion quite often.  Not sure if that is just light shifting outside, but there is no motion in the room.  Finally, one very good feature is that I was able to link the motion sensor to my smart light bulb that is connected to Wink.
title: Great interface and great picture quality and great integration with turning on lights

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: sean
content: Great product. I have a Ring doorbell and Ring spot light cams and this was a great addition to the inside of my home that uses the same account as the other devices with no additional charge. I had some cheaper “baby cams” that I have used and I was having a lot of issues with them losing connection and they didn’t record. this ring cam is nice because it records all motion and saves it on my account. So when the dog walker comes I can look back and see how good she was inside my home for piece of mind. I highly recommend this camera. The night vision is definitely a perk too!
title: Best camera I’ve had inside

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jeanne Porter
content: I initially had a very bad experience with my ring. And placed a very negative review. I very quickly heard from a customer service person at Ring who did a beautiful job of troubleshooting and decided that there was something wrong with my device and sent me a new one. So far so good! The thing that I like most about it is the broad view I get with it rather than pretty much straight ahead it has a really good coverage.
title: Great coverage

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Travis Shaw
content: Ordered the pair and had them installed quickly, although their setup could be a bit easier when installing updates (there is no feedback to indicate update is in progress or when completed). One of the cameras would constantly go offline (even with an RSSI <30, literally 6 feet from the router) and eventually just stayed off line and seemed to be stuck in reset. Ended up calling customer service (wish there was an online/email/chat rather than having to call) and agreed to send me a replacement quickly. So kudos to customer support and overall experience. I would recommend but be aware stuff happens and technology is not always foolproof.
title: Love the camera, but had one go bad shorlty after install

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Clinton S
content: Great product for such little money!  Love them!! Adding more ASAP!  Very easy setup and had working from box to wall in <15 minutes.  Quality is great, even in color night vision.  Do not worry, you absolutely can turn them off from the app without unplugging.  I’m not sure why other buyers and tech support (if they called...) couldn’t make it happen.  The option is on the app to toggle on and off.  My ONLY suggestion is the proprietary cord could be longer, but if the outlet isn’t close you can always use an extension cord.
title: Great product/price/quality/features! Must Have!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chris Warner
content: Ordered to watch the kid stuck at home schooling when I'm stuck at work. Great quality, easy to set up, and easy to adjust the modes and trigger zones, just disappointed in the very slow shipping times for a prime order, ordered to keep an eye on my little student when I'm required at work and your opinion of " essential" is just that, there is no reason to delay my order.
title: Great camera, Slow shipping.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mandy L Billings
content: Finally took the plunge and got these and the ring doorbell. We overall love them! Great for home security or just keeping an eye on your household (or I guess neighbors! LOL) Overall pretty easy to install if you are slightly patient and willing to go for it. It does take a little work but it should be easy for most. Wifi is ok...I already have bad wifi so these use up more of that width but overall work. the speakers can be a little muddy to hear but better than nothing.
title: Overall pleased

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: GandW
content: It’s okay, but don’t expect the same camera functionality like the Ring doorbell.  This device has a weak wifi antenna and you cannot turn off motion detection without losing the ability to view a live feed!  Lame!! Update: After getting an unsolicited call from Ring support (they apparently check these reviews), they helped me change settings that vastly improved the signal strength.  It was also explained to me that the inability to view a live feed when motion detection is deactivated is for privacy reasons.  I kinda get that.  Rating updated from 2 to 4 stars.  It doesn't get 5 stars because there are competing devices that have PTZ capability (Wyze).
title: Better (After Some Help

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Hurricane
content: Using this camera for an AirB&B house to protect personal items left in the garage.  It is quite sensitive, even detecting a mouse walking along a rafter at about 20 feet.  When a guest walked into the garage despite my request that he not do so, I was able to speak with him immediately and he left, quite chagrined!  Well worth the money to protect my investment.
title: Protecting an AirB&B home

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nadene A
content: Since I have had the system I’ve had issues with there batteries being faulty and lasting about a week at a time. Most recently there is an issue with the service saving all my recording as just black screens and there is no way to recover. Ring  Customer Service wasn’t helpful and rude.
title: Not reliable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Roger Hollingshead
content: JUNK, if it loses power you have to go thru the install setup again. Your network has to be really close. Had to move the camera into the same room as my router. Picture is good, when you get everything right. Swapped  for a Outdoor Stickup Camera and it is a much better fit. Really happy with it.
title: Really poor design

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jenna K
content: The Good:  No issues with wifi signal and very easy setup.  Price is good and we already have the Ring app.  Like that it uses a standard usb plug. The Bad:  We tried using this in a nursery but the video quality is not very good in the dark even though it is supposed to be 1080p.  Also, when viewing the live feed, a bright blue light turns on which makes it impossible to check on the crib without waking up the baby.  The power cord is about 6' which is quite a bit shorter than some other camera brands so you can't mount the camera high on the wall unless there is an outlet very close by.  Speaking of wall mounting:  because the mount is so short, it is impossible to tilt the camera downward enough to see the entire crib.  Ultimately, we had to return this indoor camera and decided to just reinstal our old nanny camera.
title: Ring Indoor Camera has a nice price but big design flaws

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jessica Dillon
content: Very simple set up. I purchased the ring cloud to keep a storage of everything. It senses motions of my cats when I’m away, so I say, it’s very motion sensitive. You’ll want to make sure to turn OFF the motion sensing alerts, and just check them through the app. I will purchase more of these little guys, I think they are a Fantastic monitoring system. Also works with my Alexa.
title: Simple set up, works with my Alexa devices

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BevG
content: The first one that I bought stayed on for about 20 seconds after connecting it to the internet.  The, after MUCH FRUSTRATION and technical help I was sent a replacement.....which has done the EXACT same thing... NOW...... I am waiting for a 3rd one.......I read the other reviews and was excited to get this...NOW I AM MAD AND WISH THAT I HAD KEPT MY MONEY!!!!!
title: DONT BOTHER

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: alex
content: A couple days in and I'm gonna have to return the camera. I like it and the size is perfect for what I was looking for but the clicking that comes from is driving me insane. I have this setup in my living room and it sounds like someone is snapping there fingers every time something changes on the tv. I looked it up and I guess it's just how the camera operates. Really sucks.
title: Read the Reviews! Click, Click, Click...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: M.C.R
content: I've been a Ring customer for awhile and I'm glad the finally made a smaller camera for inside. I now have 4 ring cameras and this is the best one by far. Works great in my baby's room. If I didn't have two stick cameras (older and newer versions) I'd have 3 of these.
title: One of the better Ring cams

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: the scientist
content: Awesome. The night vision and video quality is awesome, even if I hate how I look in the video.  Too bad there isn’t a Ring that is battery operated. My crazy landlord from Sun Oaks Apartment shuts off my power to bypass the cameras to steal and/or damage my property, damage the apartment, and/or poison my food. He is insane. Please make a battery operated or a version that can be converted to battery if electricity is turned off.
title: Awesome Video Quality, please make a battery operated cersion

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Beah
content: Very nice.  First try one camera did not work, probably from the way it was handle during shipping.  Customers service was amazing in exchanging and sending out new replacement.  Purchased for my daughter dorm/apartment. Maintenance and other have access when she not at home.  Not to mention my passport came up missing while I was visiting, so we thought this was a wise decision When she at home just put a black card in front of the camera for privacy.
title: 2 Set Indoor Ring camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jack Mileski
content: I bought this camera to keep an eye on my dogs while I was at work and to decide if I wanted to purchase the whole Ring security system without investing a ton of money. This camera works so well and the app on my phone is so easy to use. I can check on my dogs anytime I want and as long as I have the monitoring subscription, which is incredibly cheap (currently $3/mo.), I can rewind and save videos in case I missed something. I will be purchasing the whole home Ring security system after how well this has worked.
title: Awesome Camera, Planning on Expanding to Whole System

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ryan
content: I already have the doorbell so wanted to get something for inside. Easy to install since I already am familiar with the brand. The WiFi however doesn’t always connect and have to reset. Got tired of calling in about it so it’s just sitting here useless. Mind i mention it’s the same WiFi as the doorbell and it’s never had any problems
title: Not the best WiFi connection for a ring product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bridget Hall
content: The Ring indoor camera is amazing as a baby monitor! It has a very easy app on Android & iOS and connect via WiFi. Has native motion alerts, super clear night vision, 2 way talk, and for $3/month you can store any video it records in the secure Ring Cloud! I've been searching for the "perfect" monitor since my 2.5 y/o & infant will soon be sharing their room!
title: Best alternative baby monitor!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: William hill
content: Easy to set up easy to use and very compact and easily hidden
title: Love it

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AMZ CRAZY
content: Can’t say I am a fan. I will admit I chose this camera due to the “name brand” being so popular. I use other cameras in my home on WiFi however they won’t show on my echo show screen so purchased this one. I have NO issues with the other cameras on the WiFi. Never had any connection problems or any issues with losing connection. This ring camera constantly “buffers” and always drops off. Not what I expected. Will be returning.
title: Ring let me down. Name brand is not always the best!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lady J
content: I love the camera, but I wish they did not have that blue light in it. The other problem is for some reason it's always showing poor signal and that noise in the recording is annoying. However, it's camera is very clear and when signal it picks up the wifi signal clearly you can hear a pin drop. They should get rid of the light. Come out with a miniature version. I will buy it in a heart beat.
title: Pretty good!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Phillip
content: Bought two of these to augment my current system.  Easy setup and good quality video (although could be better).  I like the flexibility of mounting to wall or standing upright.  While there’s a setting to enhance video visibility in low light, there’s no night vision unless it’s on another version.  Lastly, it should be known that the power adapter sucks completely. The end that connects to the camera is loose.  It disconnects or falls out from simple bumps or pulls.  I’ve used white masking tape to keep mine in place.  That being said, I will buy more and just fix the cord issue myself.
title: Great Except Fixer Upper Power Cable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jonathan G.
content: Camera has good video and sound. However, you can not stream a live feed for more than 10 minutes. So forget about using this as a “live” monitor , such as a baby monitor. Every other security camera allows you to always monitor the room 24/7. Big disappointment!
title: Can’t use this monitor 24/7 for live view!👎

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mom46545
content: I wish the cord was longer or that I bought the stick up cams instead but I didn't want to have to deal with the frequent battery replacement.  I have my kitchen camera on a high shelf aimed down to get more of the kitchen area.  Sometimes the camera falls off the shelf because of the extreme downward angle.  Also the cord is a little stiff which doesn't help the problem.  I sometimes have the camera motion and recording turned off but the camera makes noises like it is recording me anyways.  I unplugged the living room one for awhile to maintain privacy.
title: Wish I loved the wired cameras  I love the Pro doorbell.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Rich P
content: Images are great.  I did have a real challenge to get the camera(s)  (I have 2) to link reliably with my WiFi.  Had to buy WiFi extenders and move the extenders around until it all worked.  If you are willing to experiment, it is well worth while.  I can look at my cameras anywhere with my iPhone and, since i have Ring's monitoring, I can play back any cameras activity from the net.  Super!
title: Clear Images

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Natalie
content: I actually hated this camera... I’m not super techy, so I bought this solely based on reviews. The reviews were good so I thought it would be okay, but it wasn’t the quality i wanted at all. I bought this with the intention of watching what my dogs do when I’m at work and it just wasn’t good enough quality so see it. The sound quality wasn’t good enough for my dog to hear so I couldn’t even stop them from misbehaving... which was the whole reason in buying it. Also, I went on vacation and lost all connection to the camera so I wasn’t able to check in the entire time I was gone. Also, the camera would send me like about 200-250 notifications per day for motion detection. So... literally any time my dogs even moved. Super not pleased with this, so I returned it and bought one for half the price that is time tens the quality.
title: Definitely not meant for high speed, quality security

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RonG
content: Live view is non existent on my galaxy note 10+. It works fine on my old galaxy 5 and an old samsung tablet. Tried every setting and when I tap live view it reverts to a recording several minutes earlier. This happens even though I have motion and recording turned off. Yes, I tried it turned on to see if it would make a difference. Yes, I uninstalled and reinstalled. I bulid computers and know how to troubleshoot. Looks like I will be returning this camera. From my Galaxy note 10, all I can view is the past. Looks like there is no software provision for this phone.
title: Beware Galaxy note 10+ owners

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: mommaclock
content: I really like this camera. It captures a wide angle and it is very sensitive in capturing motion. I have it placed to capture two entryways at once and peripherally it captures the neighbors cat walking by outside the glass door which is about 8 feet away and the cat is at least 15 feet away from the door. The picture on my phone is clear and captures a picture of the motion better than my ring doorbell.
title: A nice addition to my ring security system

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mia
content: I bought this at like 1 AM after taking my sleeping medicine.... so I was quite surprised when it got to my house around 3pm that same day! I read reviews saying I should download rapid ring and I did that which helped with lagging. I use this to be able to see and speak to my parrots when I am not home because they get lonely. It works well, they are able to understand my words clearly and they are able to tell that it is my voice which is a huge plus. The notifications are super annoying so I just turned them off. Overall I am pleased with this and I would probably buy another to monitor different rooms in my home
title: Pet Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Clyde P. Alexander
content: Very easy integration into my existing Ring and Amazon Echo smart home eco-system. Video quality and night vision is great. I have multiple Ring cameras, but this is the first wired smart camera, so I placed it in a room where I was able to hide the power cord effectively. I do like the benefit of not having to charge a battery like my other cameras.
title: Very simple integration with existing Ring and Amazon Echo system

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BC
content: I'm using this camera for watching our hummingbird feeder, I have it mounted just inside the window. I like how I can set it up to alert me when there's motion, and not arm with the rest of my Ring system. Snapshots can be pretty darn good! I didn't rate the night vision because it hasn't activated at night, as I have it set up to only monitor the feeder.
title: Great camera, versatile uses

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Arlene Zang
content: Loved the fact that I am lying in bed and can see people approaching. Can also converse with them.  This would be so great for elderly or handicapped.  I am technically challenged but this devise set itself up.  I now own 2 of them  and will be purchasing another for my back yard.
title: Able to see who is coming.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amazon Customer 85379
content: I have tried several cameras for indoor and outdoor use between Ring, Wyze, Yi, Reolink, and multiple generic brands. As far as functionality, cost, and user interface, Ring comes out on top for me. Although new, this indoor camera setup without issue, and it has worked like a charm. My outdoor stick up cams struggled with wifi due to the brick exterior, but all issues went away once I switched over to PoE. So far, no wifi issues with the indoor cam. I will be ordering more.
title: So far, so good.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: slider57
content: was very to install using the Ring app. took less than 5 minutes to completely setup. the viewing angle is way better than my old dlink camera, i can see the whole room, not one small part. i would adjust the motion settings and/or setup a motion schedule so your not getting notified every minute. and set it to person motion as well.
title: easy setup

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Eric Moyer
content: I really wanted these to work. The concept is fantastic. I bought these for the size. I already have a ring doorbell pro and it works flawlessly. The setup was very easy. I really liked how you could take the stand off and use it for a wall mount. After setup I noticed it would disconnect from WiFi constantly. I tried all the troubleshooting ideas. I like ring and I really wish these would have worked.
title: No wifi

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Steven
content: This camera is great for why we needed it and more. Originally purchased just to keep an eye on our kitchen and living room area while we are out and the kids are home BUT it’s also a great puppy cam! It’s small, light weight, easily movable and has a great picture. So far the only negative is the length of the cord as it could be a bit longer.
title: Small, lightweight and easily relocated if needed

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Claudia
content: Setup was very fast and easy. Picture and sound are clear, I love that I can zoom in and still have a clear picture. I will be getting another camera.
title: Great Product!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Justin Hyndman
content: Tried to use this as a baby monitor, we have two other ring devices so I bought this camera when I saw it came out. Didn’t realize in order for the night vision to work it turns on a very bright LED blue light that shines right on the baby. Also the video quality was lacking compared to the Foscam, which I was trying to replace because of WiFi connectivity issues. Ended up returning sadly.
title: Not useable as a baby monitor

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mark A. West
content: After losing two sweet pets in a house fire in 2014, I absolutely need to be able to monitor my home when I’m not there in person.  This camera gives me ready access and peace of mind to know everything is okay.  I highly recommend it!
title: Great camera, great price!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Starr Balash
content: Good picture quality.  Feature adjustments lacks big time. Should be able to modify motion detection and other options vs only having the on/off toggle.  Works better than the other cameras I tried.  Panning would be a good feature to add. Should be able to record videos without paying for subscription...maybe I just haven't figured this out.
title: works for what I need, lacks feature modifications

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: johnny S
content: When its dark you cant see anything. It requires light to see. 7/11/20 UPDATE After talking with the ring representative and making adjustments to placement and internal sttings, I now can see images in the dark. Its not great, but it does the job. Changed rating from 2 to 4 stars
title: Not good when there is no light (Updated)

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DE
content: It makes a loud click and a blue light comes on when it detects motion. I was using it to find the burrow of a groundhog under my deck. The groundhog heard and saw the camera when it activated. It came over, knocked the camera on its side, and scratched at it a bit. Despite minimal exterior damage, the camera no longer connects to wifi.
title: Not groundhog proof

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sandra Anderson
content: I love this camera....I set it up to watch my very old and sick cat....now I know he actually moves around more than I thought..sounds is also crystal clear......I will definitely buying another one
title: A must have for ring owners

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SuperSQL
content: Great sense of security after installing this cameras at a business to prevent any accidents or thefts. The camera pairs quickly with the wifi and can be setup using the app with ease following instructions. Also bought the ring plan for 10$ per month for saving 6 camera and 2 floodlight camera for the cloud storage. Definetly a great purchase to protect any business or home
title: Great purchase for a peace of mind

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Samuel C Bravo Jr
content: Have had this device for less than six months. Also had to buy the chime pro because this thing couldn’t grab WiFi signal. Terrible night vision. Doesn’t even record anything once it’s halfway dark. Once a week, the device needed to be completely reset up and connected to the chime. It has never worked properly and now has stopped working all together. Don’t buy and if you do, don’t buy from amazon. ‘30 day returns’ I will never buy electronics from amazon again.
title: Poorly made, Amazon does not guarantee electronics past 30 days

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nofxprs
content: Worked great for about 90 seconds.  Was watching the live video when it suddenly cut out.  Was bricked from there on out.  Starting return now.  Steer clear till they work out issues. I've had 3 ring doorbells with 0 issues.
title: Steer clear

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Goldy
content: Only worked one time.  This is a small, indistinctive plastic camera.  It was ok to set up following manufacture guidelines.  It worked well enough right after setup.  I bought it to use while away from the house for extended periods of time.  It has no off function so I unplugged it until I needed it..  The next time I did need it, unfortunately after the return period, I could not get it to connect to the wifi, even if it were directly next to the router.  I followed all the manufacture procedures, looked for help on line, all a waste of time!
title: Quit working

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: John C.
content: Had an initial issue with the setup, but after resolving the problem my camera is working.  Video quality is excellent for the low price.  Integrates with other ring products
title: Video quality is excellent for the low price.  Integrates with other ring products

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kristin Kidd
content: Great camera. We set it up without telling our kids and in the first 24 hours caught them smoking and going outside in the middle of the night. We no longer have fights over who did what....we just pull up the footage and it's solved.
title: The only thieves we have caught live with us

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KP
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Do NOT buy this camera! I purchased 1 and it NEVER even turned on???? So I asked amazon for a replacement (got that within 48 hours).
