The second one turns on, but is only in black and white (I am tech savvy and went through all of the options). So I contacted the ring chat people... they took about an hour of my time, never fixed the problem, then the chat disconnected. They never got back to me. So I unplugged it, reset the whole thing and it worked and was in color. Then the next day, it is back to black and white. Now when I go to look, it simply spins and spins as if it is connecting, but it doesn’t allow me to actually view the picture. Do yourself a favor and just buy the Nest version. Yes it’s more expensive but nest is far superior to ring in every way. Totally disappointed in the ring indoor cameras and the ring doorbell. My money goes to nest now
title: Do NOT BUY! Purchase a nest instead!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sojourn
content: I ordered two indoor security cameras. During setup, I came to find out that one of my cameras were still connected to a previous owner/account and couldn’t be activated. I then called for assistance and didn’t receive any help. After being told I would have the option of replacement if I called back in 2 days. The only option was was given was to return for a refund and take a chance on yet another two cameras possibly being a useless door knob. OR wait another 2 days (totaling 4 days of waiting)  for another department to email me to possibly fix the issue. This item was sold and fulfilled by Amazon.  This is not the type of experience you expect when you buy something that is advertised as NEW, only to uncover its still connected to a previous customer.
title: Bad experience and lack of support

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lorissa Shute
content: This camera is great. 100% as described. Setup is fast and simple, just plug it in and scan the barcode and make a few setting adjustments. It has a great field of view, I was surprised how much area the camera captures. Not a bad price either. I love my new cameras ( just got 3 ) and plan to add a few more soon.
title: A great camera for the home.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Konstantin
content: Just ok camera, don’t expect a high quality video. Just in general, I’m my opinion, Ring could have spent more money on quality of product vs quality of packaging: packaging is top notch now vs quality of product is just ok (why? Well, 1MP is not up to date with technology, should be at least 3 or better 5MP, then you can achieve a quality that will help to recognize faces, license plates etc)
title: Just ok video quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ruben Jimenez
content: Can't believe how great the cameras work, and the integration with my Alexa and Echo show and Fire Stick being able to pull the cameras up to view
title: Perfect Security Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Javier
content: Overall I like the camera. Motion detection is Ok, BUT, people detection mode is terrible. You will receive a crazy number of false alarms based on shadows, flyng leaves, moving branches, even a cat walking... It just doesn't work. Have it activated, or not, its the same. Ring, please, you can do it better...
title: People motion mode - Needs improvement

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jessica N.
content: The only reason this Ring Cam only gets 4 stars is because you have to pay for it after 30 days of use so its pretty much just a in the moment camera after your 30 days is up you wont be able to view the "motion alarms" after that trial regardless the membership for that stuff is only $3-5 a month but i cant swing it right now and I thought it would be a one time pay type of deal like some other security cameras on here. also motion is decently delayed which is to be expected but still quality could be improved.
title: Awesome camera disappointed ending.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: sharon burdette
content: I bought this to keep an eye on my dog. First time out, the camera kept on gong "off line" and I know it wasn't the Wifi or my network because the companion Ring doorbell camera I have was not offline.  Then I reviewed the stored footage and while the files were there, they seems to be stuck for 5 to 10 seconds before they started.  I called customer support and the girl I talked to blamed a lot of things including my network.  She finally had me do a hard reset and so far the camera is working better but I don't feel very confident in the product.
title: Spotty Reception

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Happy Shopping
content: Works as described.  It does make a clicking noise once it detects the infrared red so we turned that off and only have the camera on when in away mode that solved the clicking sound...  It was annoying as it is in TV room and the TV was always setting it off and on....  Problem solved....  Works good....
title: Does the job....

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lisa Kay
content: I have had  Ring doorbell for a few years. It’s does a really good job, but these (much cheaper) cameras do an AMAZING job! Super easy set up and the picture and detection is top notch. I highly recommend camera (yes, over doorbell) but all are great products only getting better each year with technology.
title: Ring gets better with every product!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JD
content: We bought this to replace another camera we use to watch our dogs during the daytime when we are at work. This camera has added bonus or allowing us to talk to our dogs and also the fisheye view is helpful. We mounted on the wall for added view. Setup was easy. Only drawback is subscription they charge to save video. We also have two floodlight cameras by the same brand.
title: Useful for watching pets during day.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: kayjay
content: it constantly loses signal, and i have to constantly have to reset it which annoys the heck out of me...because its up near the ceiling i have to take the ladder and reset it....annoying as hell and i do this from couple times a week to few times a day!!! i want to return this but its past the return time frame...dont recommend
title: its good when it works...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Fred D.
content: You get to monitor your videos for 2 months, then you must subscribe to Ring's plan and pay every month in order to see your video recorded by your camera in your home. Other wise the camera is useless. They say that I can see live motion, and customer service helped to set up live motion, yeah right! No live motion and I do not want to pay monthly so I will investigate other companies. Good luck. Your camera, your phone. your computer, your home, but Ring controls all.
title: Do Not Purchase unless, you wish to pay forever.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Adrianna Panek
content: I can't believe how well this product works. I love it! It's a clear picture (day and night) and you can go back to see what you missed and can watch live. Comes with a 30 day free trial and then you need to subscribe ($30 a year, super great price). It's so worth it. I'm a young female who lives alone and needed something to ease my mind a little. So worth the price and the yearly cost.
title: AMAZING PRODUCT!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Adaveve
content: I wish that they added ease of set up as a rating qualification. I could have sworn it was before. I love everything about this camera except that the setting on the app are somewhat difficult to control regarding the setting and when it starts controlling. It wasn’t terrible, just a little irritating.
title: Fantastic camera, even better when you get it part of a bundle

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alan
content: I'm surprised how excellent the RING HI-Def Camera is.  I was a Vivint security customer but now I'm switching over to RING and saving $$$ while getting superior video quality on my camera. VIVINT images are on left.  RING HD images are on the right.
title: I'm switching over to RING Security

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: R. Kienzle
content: The  camera is small and cheaply made. but since i am using it with a hotspot it takes a while for the video to process. I was not aware of the $3.00 monthly subscription either. so after 30 days RING told me that i will not be able to view nothing except live view. ... unless i buy their monthly subcription of $3.00 a month. Well how good is that? Who is gonna sit and wait to see live view until something happens.  I'd rather buy the Wyze v2 that does not require monthly subcription and you can add a SD card to store events. Plus you get 2 wyze cam for the price of 1. I'm returning it.
title: must have subscription after 30 days or U cant view  nothing!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: M. Weaver
content: This works great to see what our pup is up to when we aren’t home.  Seemless integration with our other Ring cameras including alerts, picture and sound is good. I really liked the cheaper price as the stand up camera was too much to justify for my needs
title: Awesome price and fits our needs

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Faun b.
content: So initially I was a little nervous to buy this because I read some reviews saying that it would be difficult to see the picture at night if it was placed facing out a window . But I didn't have that problem at all all I did was clean the window with a little bit of alcohol made sure there was no streaks or smudges and it was fine once i adjusted the video settings through the app (literally one little switch but it still looked fine either way honestly) . The only problem i had was the speaker , i could hear what was going on but they couldnt hear me to well the other way around, Its too quiet thats why i knocked it down to 4 stars. but if you dont care if the other person can hear you or not and its strictly for surveillance then its worth the money and gets the job done 💯
title: easy set up worth the money. Just dont expect the best speaker quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Reid S
content: The wifi signal is terrible. Between this and the app, it takes about 1 minute for the live view to display. All of my ring cameras are a disappointment. I need to change the reviews on the previous ones I own. The first week was ok but it just goes downhill from there when u realise how bad the system is.
title: Horrendous wifi signal, extremely poor app.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: A.F.Hill_ MD
content: Ring has the best Customer Service team. The team contacted me regarding a bad review on the cameras that I purchased and they fix the problem for me right away. The team  continued to contact me to make sure everything was working even with my ring doorbell pro. You couldn’t ask for a better customer service team.
title: Best Customer Service

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Remi Swartzendruber
content: This product has a great view. I can see almost yhe entire room. It's crisp. But. It lags. It's at least 10 seconds behind. The app is a pain in the rear. It says it has a weak connection to my phone but I have FULL signal and I'm sitting next to my router connected to wifi. I'll be returning these unfortunately.
title: Not fantastic

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alexis Aguero
content: A very good camera for the price, Wyze cam is getting competition now and all thanks to them. This Ring camera replaced my Wyze cam which hasn’t been very reliable lately. Both are very good in terms of video quality. I also own a Amazon cloud cam and love that the ring camera has faster motion detection vs Cloud cam. However, the Ring cameras microphones are really bad, you can’t hear anything unless the noise is happening directly in front of the camera which is annoying. Also, the mounting hardware is very limited and stiff, I feel like you would have more versatility with a third party mounting hardware. I like how the power adapter and micro usb cable is one piece and low profile which prevents accidental unplugs. However the length itself is too short most other cameras, like the Amazon Cloud Cam come with a 10ft usb cable which is a great length. Overall I’m very pleased with the quality and prefer it over the Wyze Cam.
title: Great small camera with a few hiccups

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: kya
content: The other ring products are better.  This one randomly makes a loud  screeching sounds, it happened five times.  I called the company to report the sound but they were unfamiliar with it and unable to assist.  It constantly gets knocked off of the wifi and the night vision could be better.  It's not the worst product but definitely not the best...it's not at the same level as other Ring products
title: Mediocre

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Princess P
content: I have a ring spotlight cam and works great. I bought this one for indoor use and I don’t really like it. I have set to people only and the motion picks up my cat every time he passes by. I expected better quality out of night vision. And I have trouble connecting to live view with particular this device whereas I zero problems connecting to my other ring devices. Overall I guess expected a better quality product from Ring.
title: Expected a better product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Elizabeth
content: We purchased this indoor Ring camera after trying another type of indoor monitor which we could not get to connect to our wifi. This camera took less than 5 minutes to set up! I'm very happy with the coverage. It works perfectly for daytime or night monitoring. When not needed we simply unplug it. When plugging back in it automatically connects and begins working in seconds.
title: Easy Set Up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SanibelBeachNut
content: didn't want to pay 100 for a ring camera so when this indoor one came out for 59 I had to pull the trigger.  bought two and had them up and running in minutes.  Love the Ring door bell system, the Ring alarm system and now these little cameras!
title: best bang for the bucks

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kindle Customer
content: Overall this was easy and I setup. The apps for iPhone worked well and allows you to zoom on part of field of view. The windows app is not so accommodating. There is only option for storing video in the clouds with subscription. It does allow remote live view without a subscription. I don’t see why they do not allow storage of video on a HDD or NAS or on a flash drive
title: Ring Camera experience

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Will Pringle
content: Don't buy, save money and get better features with other cameras, I get excessive notifications that are hard to control then the camera can never actually connect to show whats going on, all recordings require a subscription. The key feature is not available in my area so no way to actually take advantage of that promotion either.
title: Terrible Notification and Motion Settings, Subscription Required for anything useful

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dwonna Hopgood
content: Maybe I got a defect but my camera stopped recording events. I tried to remove and reinstall the device using my ring app but it never would sync with the wifi again. I'm extremely disappointed!
title: Stopped recording

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Natalie Wood
content: Grear product!  Discreet small design.  Picture is pretty clear.  Motion detection is on point.  When we turned the sensitivity settings up, it picked up more motion in the dark.  I like the option of turning on the alarm and being able to talk through it.  One of our best purchases!  Thinking of getting another set.
title: Discreet with clear picture

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: MJ
content: A nice, small cam you can put anywhere. A good affordable Ring cam for inside. Works great in the garage, basement, etc - basically anywhere that is out of the elements. Powered by a micro usb cable/power supply. I haven't tried it, but I imagine you could use a longer USB cable and power with a 2.5amp charger if you had to. Love Ring.
title: Nice addition to the Ring family

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ken R.
content: Wow, these cameras work really really well.  Other cameras were much more expensive and was leery about going the cheaper way but am very glad I did.  They do exactly what they claim to do.  The night vision is a little iffy but you can still see.  The daytime is perfect.  Would highly recommend.
title: What a great product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KCAT
content: Works better than I expected. I bought this to use in my basement as an added measure of security. The motion detector works great,  the ebility to talk to the person that is in front of the camera works well, and night vision is surprisingly good for a room with no ambient light whatsoever. I recommend this product.
title: Simple and easy to use.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Wayne A. Lang
content: I do use ring in my house . This was my first indoor camera . I ordered two and after both stopped working the same day and calling tech support to verify it they were returned for my money back!!!! At this point I did not want a replacement. Very disappointed
title: Will NOT buy again

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Aaron W
content: This is so very easy to setup and use. The only concern is a power interruption since it has to be plugged in at all times, with no battery backup that I'm aware of.
title: Quick setup and easy to use

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Gogster2k
content: This indoor camera works great but security access from hackers needs much more improvement. To be fair, just about all the IP cameras on the market needs much more better security. This one is used in a room for watching the cats. I will not use any IP camera anywhere else inside the house because of the potential hacking issues.
title: Great camera but security access from hackers as seen on the news, etc.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: EH
content: One of three cameras constantly gets disconnected from my account. Of course after the return period. So I always have to re add it to my ring account. Will need to replace soon, as it’s light no longer flashes blue. ***Update. Ring replaced this camera for free, and the new one works perfectly. Thank you!
title: Good price for indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Valhalla
content: You will see I buy alot of cameras. Guess I am a junkie. This is the first ring I have bought and trust me it out does all the rest. Most of the cameras I buy were cheaper ones and after over a year they are starting to lose hope. Not going off most the time, going off for no reason and so forth. I will buy Ring from now on though and that is for sure.
title: If you look at my purchases

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Derek Gallo
content: Use this as a baby room monitor. Works ok for that job but we stick to the traditional monitor still. Would be great if you could leave the video feed on your echo all night but it shuts off. The constant motion notifications during the day get quite annoying. The feature to snooze them from the Apple Watch or iPhone lock screen notification only works about 20% of the time. Thus we end up just shutting them off completely. Otherwise, the camera works as advertised.
title: Not useful as a baby monitor but otherwise good

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alex Yanez
content: DO NOT BUY!!!! After installing our ring cameras for our home indoors. We started hearing voices that were not mine nor my wife’s voice through the cameras. We thought maybe were over thinking it. TODAY AS WE WERE HAVING DINNER SOMEONE BURPPED ON THROUGH THE CAMERA AND WAS MAKING HUMMING NOISE!!! IN THE MORNING AS WELL WE HAVE FOOTAGE OF SOMEONE REPEATING WHAT MY WIFE WAS SAYING TO OUR KIDS!!! DO NOT BUY PLEASE!! Scary situation.!!!
title: Regret purchasing indoor ring for my home

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ram
content: Another great RING product. After having an awful experience with Wansview cameras that I also bought on Amazon I swore that I would just spend a little extra $$ and buy these. I unboxed it and hooked it up to my current RING system in less than 5 minutes. Really satisfied with the amazing video quality.
title: LOVE IT.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SheltieMom
content: Purchased this camera to keep an eye on an older dog with health problems I tried to access one night from work and even with talking to her there was no response, I was very upset and thought I had lost my dog.  When I got home that night she came running to greet me. Needless to say I have placed this camera in another location and seems to be working better.
title: Kept freezing

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Hannah and Mike
content: This is a pretty good camera. Disappointed that there is no functionality to move the camera electronically. Hs to be manually adjusted. Additionally you will need to pay $3/month to amazon to be able to see your videos, otherwise this is just a live camera. Having the doorbell by the same company I expected it to be one fee for all, but it is that same monthly fee for each item.
title: Good camera but only manually adjustable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kelly
content: The cameras work awesome, when you have the wifi signal to support them.  Apparently many of them aren't mafe to connect to your 5Ghz bands on your modems, which is the stronget band.  However, they work pretty well, so I can't be upset.  It definitely comes in handy when we wanna catch the kids sneaking in the pantry for snacks.
title: WiFi and these...  *Sigh*

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Renee
content: These are very glitchy when it comes to the app the speaker cuts in and out all the time and you can hardly understand what anyone is saying. The camera itself glitches but not as much as the speakers. It’s not worth the price I paid I would not recommend. Good for super basic things maybe like a nanny cam or something like that but definitely not to help home security.
title: Mediocre

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Brien P Crotty
content: I have a number of these already, and bought a couple more on Prime Day.  I have the Ring Alarm system and these tie in perfectly, and will work well even if you don't have the alarm.  The video quality is great, and you can adjust motion zones to avoid areas with frequent movement, for example.  Love these cameras!
title: Fantastic cameras at a great price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Daniesza
content: Not exactly invisible but that can be a deterrent for snoopers. Hooked up to my ring app I get annoyingly notified everytime movement occurs and I have to figure out how to configure it to be quieter. Sound isn’t the best but image is good enough to decipher a face if they are close up and if not well I guess zooming in would be the option but there isn’t that function on this.
title: I spy with my little ring

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: april
content: I just received yesterday and was surprised with the quality of the picture and the easy set up. I plan on purchasing more to place in other areas of my house. I am able to talk to my children through the camera with my phone when I’m not home. Option to have notifications sent to your phone upon motion detection, great product!
title: Great product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: rwrife
content: Overall it's the quality and size you'd expect from a Ring camera, everything works as expected except that range of motion for pointing the camera is extremely limited, so if you're expecting to be able to mount this in weird locations and point the camera at extreme angles, it's not going to work.
title: Nice quality and size, but range of motion is limited...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Michael Quade
content: Already having a Ring Pro doorbell cam, I had high hopes for this product.  It provided great picture quality and all the same features I love with the Ring Pro.  Unfortunately I bought this product to be a baby cam, and this is where it falls short.  The Live View automatically stops after 5-10 minutes, which is quite useless for overnight monitoring.  I fully understand automatically stopping live view in case someone inadvertently leaves a battery powered unit on, but for hard wired devices live view automatic disconnect should be allowed to be disabled.
title: Not good for a Baby Monitor

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Frosty
content: Love this indoor video cam.  I have entire ring system so this is one additional enhancement for indoors.  When I lock doors at night,  I turn this video cam on as an added feature for indoor safety.  While home during day I do not keep it turned on. Works very well.  I also like that is is very small and doesn’t detract from house decor in room.
title: High quality video cam.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angel
content: The camera is fine no issue at all. The only thing is RING product give you a free trial for a month after that they want you to pay a fee for using the cloud, for me is enough to pay for my ring door. If I had known this, I would surely have selected another camera in the market that would not charge for the cloud. In fact I have one (Yi Home) yes... is from China !!!!! but  works pretty well and I don't need to pay, only if you want to have more storage space.
title: If I knew this I will choose  another camera in the market, no fee to pay!!!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ella Hou
content: I installed it in room to monitor the door, but if I got home in dark, it usually can’t catch my first enter the room, the sensitivity in dark/long time no monitoring function need to be improved. It’s easy to setup, but when I adjusted it, it’s too easy to press the setup button on top, and there’s no go back option, so I have to set it up over again....
title: Good product, needs more improvement

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Rebecca Garcia
content: Amazing! Crystal clear view of my daughter, she loves to nap on her bed during the day, she is almost 2 years old and when she naps I go downstairs and clean, and I can keep an eye on her! And it gives me notifications on my phone and is compatible with Alexa and pairs with our ring doorbell!+3
title: Amazing. Peace of mind.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Christine Desmoni
content: I bought this as I am a caregiver to a family member. And when I am not home and I call his cell and no one answers I can view to see if he is OK as frequently he misplaced his cell. Also the ping goes if he gets up in the middle of the night. So I am aware. Gives me peqse Of mind when I am not home. It can be programmed for people so pets don’t trip it. You can alway place on a timer E.Z set up to connect to WIFI and down load the App
title: Caregivers Peace of Mind

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Meg
content: This is a really nice little camera that allows us to see what's going on in the room really clearly. Best feature if that if I'm at work and my teenager is not responding to texts, I can turn on the Ring alarm and demand her attention. Annoying for her? Maybe. Awesome for me? YES.
title: Nobody mentions the best feature!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jessica
content: Great camera. I wanted similar to a Furbo but don't need a treat dispenser. I needed to an eye on my young dog who liked to destroy everything, it was a pain coming home from work to clean up a giant mess everyday, this camera has decreased that pain by 90%. You can speak into the ring app and they can hear it. I dont use it for motion detection since I need it for dog surveillance but it is very sensitive to it so it works great. It's also very neat how you can zoom in and out.
title: Love this camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: GPer
content: Easy to connect to my existing Ring account. Took minutes. Very clear in both night vision and daylight. Picks up motion and is easy to review the video. Lots of options that are simple to find and navigate the app. Only con would be to add GeoFencing.  Would like motion turned off when I am home moving around my place. Instead it captures my motion and sends alerts.
title: Great inexpensive camera!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ryan Dalling
content: Love the ring products. This one is simple to setup and use. The only negative is the power cord plugs fairly deep into the camera and if it is jostled loose, you may not notice that it is the cord, as the cord may still be in the socket part way. (Wife dropped it and didn't notice.) Good quality and worth the money. Will buy it again if I find I need more cameras.
title: Nice quality for a low price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Miller
content: It is dead after 3 days. light is on for 1 second and then off for 30 seconds. customer service is not helpful at all: she kept asking me to follow her instructions to do this and do that (which I did already before). Anyway, I still followed her instructions to re-do everything twice and after fifty (50!) minutes she proposed another idea: please reset the network settings of your phone! How ridiculous! Ring.com's customer service is a joke!
title: dead after 3 days, customer service is not helpful at all

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bob Kenyon
content: My WiFi has been acting up ever since I installed my Ring doorbell, so I had some trouble when I installed this camera at my home, but it works well and I like it.  Alexa sometimes has trouble understanding when I ask her to show me the camera, but she usually gets it on the second request.  The speaker is a little fuzzy, but you can still hear what’s being said.
title: Solid product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Hugh
content: Returned, would never pair with my phone ring app. Called Tec support, they tried for over an hour and never got it to work.
title: Returned

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dave Zorychta
content: This product is overly complex and thus too prone to failure versus just a simple IP camera. I bought this product to monitor my apartment when I'm away on a trip. One day into the trip the camera has lost wifi connectivity. I know my wifi network is up because I can remote desktop into my computer on the same wifi network. The ring app is useless, telling me how to troubleshoot the issue at my apartment. Except I'm not at my apartment. That's the point of having a security camera... why doesn't this device repeatedly attempt to re-establish a network connection upon losing it? Why doesn't the device restart itself if its software crashes?
title: USELESS! Lost wifi connection connection after one day

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ben A. Salisbury
content: It is small and easy to setup. There is no remote angle control, so you can only  move the angle or view point physical.  Reason I only gave it three stars is the image quality is average. You think with security you want better image. It’s like the door bell camera image, so-so. If you try to zoom in on anything it’s garbage.
title: Small at easy setup, but image quality is lacking.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: PackRat206
content: I just installed one of these to compliment my older Outdoor Ring cameras,  put this one in my garage gets full coverage excellent night vision as well, also just bought another outdoor camera, I have been using ring cameras and doorbell since they first came out.
title: Easy connection to WiFi, great quality video

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Globemaster 3
content: The setup was easy and integration to Alexa smart home was simple. That is all 5 stars. The big downside is the audio and microphone. It gives lots of feedback and is unreadable most of the time with lots of lag. If you want only for video, this is your camera. If you want to use for audio or two-way voice, then I’d probably pass.
title: Excellent video but audio and mic are average at best

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angela Scalera
content: I love this camera. it has a Great view. I have it so I can see my new puppy at night while we train her to go in her crate. The best part you can see it at night in the dark as well and hear if she is crying or barking from wherever I am. The camera can move to different rooms. I love it.
title: Greatest invention...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: George
content: No complaints other than even though I have the motion set to the highest level meaning an adult-sized person it's still routinely alerts and record throughout the day for any little motion. It's a little annoying. I called rain and got some double talk but the end result is it's not as effective motion wise as my other ring security cameras.
title: Good with a few improvements needed

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: PacNW
content: As with all ring cameras these are adequate. Nothing earth shattering but they do a good job. One of the cameras showed up non functional. This is main reason for only 4 stars. They did replace it. Easy enough. But it’s not the first time this has happened so you have to wonder about their longevity or initial build quality. QA etc.
title: Not bad, not great, but not bad

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joe V.
content: Useless as a baby monitor! I purchased this as a replacement for the Amazon cloud cam that is no longer being made so that I would be able to have one app to monitor the babies room, front door (ring) and other areas of the house.  The Amazon Cloud Cam allowed me to stream video and audio throughout the night.  This camera and all ring cameras apparently timeout after several minutes with no option to override.  Both cameras are made by Amazon.  I am now forced to pay for two separate subscriptions for two separate Amazon camera products -  not to mention the extra holes in my wall that I need to now need to waste my time repairing. Ring support was also useless, there is nothing worse than being connected with someone in India who has no command of the English language and just reads off a script.
title: Useless as a baby monitor

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TheCatsPajamas
content: Noticed it didn't always capture motion (example: it would show out vehicle in one motion capture, then in the next one an hour later it would show it gone. So it didn't catch us walking in front of the camera). Also we wish there was a way to turn off the night vision. Ended up returning due to not being able to use looking out the front window in our apartment -- all that would show is the reflection of the inside of our kitchen :/ Pro - the month free trial was neat and definitely a reasonable price to continue 👍 quality was awesome.
title: Sad it didn't work out...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Toni Thomason
content: One of the cameras stopped working after two days and can not get it to re connect. Troubleshooting didn’t help and even waited on hold for half an hour with no help. We have several ring cameras already and have had great experience with those but these just fell short
title: Disappointing

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joe Schmoe
content: This works great the way it's set up to work. I was hoping to get a camera that I could just keep on using an old phone as a monitor to keep an eye on my dogs. It doesn't work that way but with the motion sensing it lets me know when to check what they are doing. I tried one of the many cheap cameras before this, it was garbage. At least this one is reliable
title: Works as described

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: M
content: Great range on this camera and with the latest update to the ring app it solved the loading problems we were having with the door bell. This is with all lights off and one light on. Can stream, app is amazing to use, and while motion sensor video is separated into time limits it seems almost seamless. Especially with the last update. Bought two more after using this one for a couple of days.
title: Amazing quality and picture

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SL
content: The reason I’m giving this 1 star is bc I ordered 2 cameras and one stopped working less than 60 days after activation.  Looks like I got a lemon of a camera and now can’t return it or get $$ back.  I’m going to switch to another camera system bc if this.
title: Stopped working

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nichol Mignanelli
content: Bought this device to be able to keep an eye on inside the house while I am not home. It has a very wide angle so I can see 2 rooms with 1 camera. I love being able to see the kids and have the 2way speaker on it so we can talk back and forth. The night vision is amazing you can always see what’s going on.  Motion detection pick up everything I like that. You can turn the alert on and off for the motion so when you are home your phone is not going off constantly for motion. I turn it on when I leave the house and no one is home so I will get notification if someone comes in the house. My next purchase will be the ring doorbell to try.
title: Vision, Night vision and sound top notch

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Peter M. Silecchio
content: Another Great Security Camera from RING. This is my Second Camera From RING. Very easy to set up, took all of 5 min. Down Load the RING App and that’s it. Great Small Size easy to hide. Made High Quality. Has a Very Nice Clear Picture. Now I can check what’s going on at home when I am away. Two way Talk with Motion Activation.
title: GREAT PICTURE!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Musiclena
content: I Previously owned momentum cameras but became very frustrated when it did not capture movement 90% of the time and or did not archive the videos. Since installing my ring cameras I have had no issues with any of the motion or without picking up movement. I would definitely recommend these to my friends and family.
title: Best cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Looncatty
content: I use these to keep an eye on my animals when I go out of town. They are easy to set up and can be easily moved around the house. Unlike Arlo, I can check in from any network to view the fur kids. I replaced my Arlo cameras with these.
title: Better Than Arlo

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ghost
content: I bought this for the sole purpose of placing it in the house while we were on vacation. I already have an exterior camera system, but it doesn't send alerts to my phone. This product was easy to setup and worked great; the picture quality was superb as well and the notifications worked very well when testing it.
title: Great security camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: athurman
content: I have a Ring environment, so adding these was super easy and once installed, it does as expected.  You can adjust the sensitivity of the motion, change when you are notified of motion (do you really want to get an alert on your phone every time you open the refrigerator?!  Setup is as easy as scan the QR code with your phone and follow the instructions, done in 2 minutes.  I bought the 3-pack, so it really enhanced my Ring  experience.  Ring support is helpful and on two occasions they helped me with adjusting the configuration to meet my needs.
title: sharp picture, good motion detection, & OK night vision

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: tatyana
content: Motion detection is cool and all but BOY is it a pain in my neck to have to constantly snooze the motion. the vibrations wake me up when im sleeping and even at the least sensitive, it still goes off like 50 times in 10 minutes. OVERALL, i am extremely satisfied with this camera and when i move into my apartment, i’ll definitely be purchasing a doorbell and a couple more things! LASTLY, i love the easy accessibility of the app. everything is user-friendly and not overly complicated. Very good camera
title: Snooze the motion FOREVER

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Robbie Adams
content: This little camera has everything.  It has night vision, chat both ways, motion activation, great field of view and never runs out of power. It also includes a siren in app, so you can activate it to scare people off in real time.  I highly recommend this camera for every day use.  Once you tie it in with the app, you can manage all your Ring cameras in one place.
title: Excellent Camera at a Great Price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kelley
content: It says it is registered to another owner so it will not let me set it up **UPDATE Ring customer service contacted me and got this fixed ASAP! Best customer service ever!
title: Great Customer Service!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Carlos Stoffel Jr
content: I am really surprised by the quality of this camera.  I really do like the cameras. I bought the 2 camera package. Great deal.... The motion detection is really good and I get notified every single time. I am going to do the $100 a yr subscription because my step son has Epilepsy and when he is home we can always keep an eye on him.  The night vision is really good as well. Very high quality. e can speak to people and also hear everything. The sound on it is very good. Over all, I am very pleased with this and I am going to be buying 2 more cameras.
title: Very Well Pleased

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amanda Martin
content: Awesome product! Can’t go wrong with ring cameras! Already had the video doorbell and liked how it worked so decided to get the cameras and I’m very happy with them! The only thing I don’t like is you have to subscribe to a plan to record ANYTHING. I have Dlink cameras as well and my dlink camera records at least 24 hours with no plan.
title: Good cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RJ
content: I have the ring Doorbell and Alarm, and this was a nice addition to the set. It has a good image quality with good lighting situation, but I found the night vision is not so great, and definitely short range. I hate the Ring monthly subscription in general. Overall, it is a good camera!
title: Good Camera but not perfect!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Minh Le
content: Already have some other ring products and needed to add a camera for a room. This is exactly what I needed and syncs with Alexa and other ring products. The wide angle view makes it easy to cover an entire room or floor. Overall I am very happy with this wired indoor camera.
title: Great addition to other great Ring products!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jade
content: Love these, no issues. The clicking sound I hear at times is only at night in a dark room with the tv on. I think it’s the night vision that keeps adjusting. The quality is great during the day and night. It picks up motion very well, kinda annoying at times lol so I set up the motion zones for only specific areas. App is great to use.
title: Good cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ashley Simms
content: Purchased three of them. Out of the box one didn’t work. The other two worked for about five minutes and then went offline never to be heard from again. Currently researching cameras from other companies.
title: Incredibly disappointed

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: J Cruz
content: There is no way to receive a notification if a camera goes offline. Support's solution is to check the camera's health on a regular basis. WRONG ANSWER! This is an extremely important missed feature that is offered by competitors. I would not have purchased if i had known of this issue.
title: No notification if camera goes offline!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: j Gib
content: Super easy to set up works great only complaint I have to turn off the motion while people are home otherwise it continues to go off on the phone all the time and sometimes forget to set when we leave but otherwise picture is good and does the job.
title: Small and works great

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: White
content: Overall, you cannot beat the price and quality for what you are paying. If you are worried about your security, there’s a convenient stop all recording feature. Which is great! Picture quality is very clear in both day and night vision. For what you pay, you can’t get upset over this purchase, highly recommend!
title: Why not?

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jeger
content: Camera needs to have access to the web to access local video on the camera.  Advertised as local saved on card without explanation of required internet connection. Don't buy this camera thinking you have local access without internet.  HUGE PROBLEM
title: Failed to advised that internet is needed to access your local video on card

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: B. Phil Howell
content: I can get this item to stay connected to wifi for about a day.  then the light stays on like it's working and the app states it's been disconnected.  Support questions and forums from ring only show situations that are not like mine.  My camera is 3 feet from the wifi hub.  The support is the most disappointing...
title: Keeps disconnecting

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: A Guy
content: I bought this as a replacement to a now defunct Wyze cam that watched over my back yard. While this is billed as an indoor unit, I placed it under an awning outside and have had no issues with it. Cheap, easy to install (took longer to open the box than to get it running) and so far has been reliable.
title: Pleasently surprised

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BeenJiggy
content: I use it to figure out which kid is telling the truth, and to make sure they get out of bed for school while I’m at work. The Motion is super sensitive. I get 100 notifications an hour and yes I updated the zone. I had the battery stick up cam before this and the motion wasn’t as sensitive. This is still a useful device.
title: Gets the job done

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angelica
content: This is a really nice camera (video quality is great) buuuuut.... for as expensive as it is, I wish it could be controlled more remotely. I bought cheaper nanny cams on Amazon that let me move the camera with my phone. The only reason I bought this was to be able to have one interface for all my cameras (we recently got the ring doorbell and spot light cameras). Overall I am happy with it.
title: Wish it moved

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Fabio Nishimura
content: Was slower than my other RING cameras.  All of which have their own quirks (slowness to connect to Spotlights) and Doorbell 2 doesn’t capture people walking up to the entrance. But this one tops it all. It simply stopped working after two weeks of use. It would randomly go into setup mode and start talking... until it simply didn’t power on. Garbage.
title: Garbage.  Broken in less than a month

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Niko Washington
content: Amazon delivered quick. Easy set up since already have a ring device and account. Works great, clear pic and sound. Bought it as a baby monitor. No need for all that extra stuff. All the thousands of different types of monitors out there. Scrape all that. Just get this and use tablet, ipad, or smart device and you good to go
title: Ring is just the right thing

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Leibe
content: we absolutely love our cameras,  I'm very impressed with the night vision,  the recording options and the settings options. We almost spent a ton of money with a security company,  this was the best purchase ever.  We continue to buy more and are so pleased.
title: Best system ever.  So many perks. Great night and day vision and recording options

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Boricua
content: Ring system can be ideal, but, worthless without a monthly premium $ each month.  Delayed alerts are also frequent.  The shame is camera and bell, the neighbors connection is a great tool. There are other system which are as good or better without monthly fees.
title: Nice camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: kris s.
content: Ordered 3 during Prime day, but 1 was doa. Amazon was great about replacing it very quickly though so no real issues. Love the smaller size compared to the stick up cams. The cord is a little short to be able to mount higher on the wall though. Almost wish there was a battery option or an option to choose the cord length. Picture quality is good and it has a pretty wide viewing angle.
title: Works great with the ring system

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: John Doe
content: I’m very surprised Ring/Amazon released this.  Standing directly in front of it in a lit room the camera can barely distinguish any facial features.  The camera is definitely NOT hi def.  I have internet upload speeds above 10 mbps (down above 200) so it can’t be blamed on internet speeds.  It will be going back.
title: Poor quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Emerald
content: Easy to install, I just don’t like how low I had to mount them to capture less ceiling and more room. A battery option would prevent all the cords since they’re basically eye level. Love the rewind and 2 way talk. Also like that these have a siren as well. Connected with Alexa to announce when there’s motion.
title: Bang for buck.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AllSeason41
content: I’ve ordered a couple of these, one has been working fine but the second one keeps disconnecting or not connecting whenever I would watch the live view. The cam was setup pretty close to the router even closer than the one that was working. I had to unplug and plug again the power to get it working. Not very reliable compared to my two wired stick up cam which have been working outside the house.
title: Disconnecting frequently in live view

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Feng Feng
content: After seeing reviews from Lifehackster, I bought this cam for my new home. It is working great. The notification is very quick. But one important feature for me is missing, that its motion detection can't be disabled / enabled via Alexa, instead, I have to do it via the App, which is very inconvenient.
title: The cam is excellent. But I definitely want the feaure to disable motion detection via Alexa.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Virginia
content: Glad to find this at such a great price! Super easy to set up and gives me peace of mind
title: Must have for house

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ronale d johnson
content: For the price you can't beat it. I dont pay to have my home monitored I don't myself....with the motion sensors turned on it's all good. Plan to add two more inside the house and a outdoor one for the swimming pool area, not bad Ring...not bad at all
title: Can't go wrong

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Udit Budhia
content: Needed a camera that was cheap to monitor my garage.  Video quality is pretty good and also does a pretty decent job in low light (via IR LED's) and during the presence of strong sunlight (especially when my garage is open). Price of $59.99 is not to hard on my pockets too.
title: Good value for money

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: bigfoot
content: Good camera. Other cameras I’ve had like YI 360 1080p are good also but, this ring camera is smaller and picture quality is better.  But most of all the connection to internet is better!  Thanks Ring!  I will be adding more later.
title: Great little camera!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: marty
content: I bought 3 of these for my business.. I have a retail store that has two entrances.  I put one facing each entrance and one in the office.  I turn them off during the day, but on at night.  It is an inexpensive way to monitor what is going on when I am not there.  I can turn them on and off from my phone.  Love them
title: Works great to monitor my business.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Steven Johnson
content: Picture quality is great the apps are very good too. Very easy setup. The only thing I don’t like is not being able to keep the live view up on my PC or IPad, the live view times out after 10 minutes by design. Other than that these cameras are awesome.
title: Great picture and apps are easy to use.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: mdo2616
content: I  Like the fact that it's small and compact and it works nice the only downfall is that always loses Internet connection .plus I can not be able to talk with audio cause nobody can hear me it's all jumbled up. I can hear them clearly.
title: Its just ok. Going to look for another

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: PH
content: These cameras seem like they would be great - after doing some research, get the NEST cameras if you care about the functionality that I care about.  We want to monitor a front room from the back. The live video stream lasts a maximum of 10 minutes on the Echo screen before it is shut down by Ring. The Echo will SAY that it detects motion but WON'T turn on the screen to show you what is happening. What is the point? You can't watch the screen and you can't have the screen/video stream turn on when there is motion. It is so close to being useful!
title: Echo Show integration is worthless

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alyssa Turner
content: This was super easy to set up - just scan the QR code, plug it in, and go. We have the Ring doorbell, but wanted an indoor camera to watch our dog during the day. The viewable area is large and you can set the motion detection to lower or higher sensitivity. I would recommend setting up the 2 factor authentication; especially for an indoor camera. Nice pup-nanny cam!
title: Nice addition to Ring package

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joan M Laird
content: I have gone through many camera's.  Ring is the only product that works like it should, and gives me total peace of mind.  This new camera is so good, and the price is not at all expensive.  I bought one and since purchase 3.  All my camera's are Ring and I love them.  You can't go wrong with this product.
title: Best camera's on the Market

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: L. South
content: I don't often put my dogs in a kennel, but for those times when I have to, I want to be able to check on them often. I haven't used the audio features yet, but the video quality is excellent.
title: I love this little camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bismill
content: Great picture quality and connection. I havn't had a single disconnection since i bought this several months ago. I take time with my reviews to test items first and then provide my feedback. If you are looking for an indoor camera then this is it for you.
title: Great Product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kathy W
content: I love the product but it did not meet my needs. I wanted to monitor my dogs in their crates when I was away but unfortunately it picked up every time they pick their head up and I put it at the least sensitivity and it still did not work. I love the product it just didn’t work for me
title: Great product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Xu Hui Ye
content: Got it to use as a baby monitor with our new baby. 3 weeks in and it works really great! The motion detection is sensitive ( may be too sensitive at times) so I get alerts on my phone whenever the baby moves. The ability to set the motion detect zone is a plus. The night vision and overall image quality is very good. The microphone and speaker works great as well. There is a slight delay, but it may be due to our internet speed. Overall really pleased with the camera for our purpose. Though there are minor gripes, it works a lot better than all of the more expensive baby monitoring systems we have purchased over the years.
title: Great Baby Monitor

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cuddy
content: i wanted to love this camera, but i am using in a garage, where i have had no trouble with any other device getting my wifi, but for some reason this camera keeps coming in and out of wifi connection. this is at 60 feet prob with 1 wall between router and camera.
title: WIFI is weak

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: dtucker1721
content: Very easy setup...motion detection is great and the night vision exceed my expectations...clear pictures all around. My only complaint is the BRIGHT blue light...there is no way to shut it off...I'm going to try to put a small piece of black electrical tape over it...we'll see...anyway a GREAT product.
title: Nice

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dennis J.
content: You have to buy protection plan for it to record video. But with that said Ring is great company. My chime pro went bad & they sent me a new one free. Their tech support worked with me and solved my problem.
title: Ring support is great

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Babs
content: 1st Cam -Constantly loses WIFi connection, while all my other indoor/outdoor cams perform fine.  Several times I've had to call to get help getting it back on line as the RESET button does not appear to always work.  Royal Pain.  I'm asking for a refund. 2nd Cam (replacement cam - Ring contacted me the day after the first review,,their customer service rocks!, ) is working great.
title: The 1st cam constantly went offline

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Piero collura
content: Very good camera, however, I bought this to use as a baby monitor but when viewing the live feed it times out after 10 mins and you have to reconnect pretty inconvenient and disappointing and I hope they considered in the the future that parents want to use these as baby monitors and come up with a solution
title: baby monitor Warning

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jonathan M.
content: we got this to point at our doggy door to see how often our dogs were going in and out and what they were up to during the day, we have really found out we like checking it out when we are gone for the weekend as well as we can check in on them and dog sitters.
title: Doggy Door Vision

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Evie S.
content: Unstable. Always offline every few days. Do not waste your money. I have 5 of these sitting in a drawer. I am a techie and I also hired another techie/IT expert we can't get it to stay on or reset or reprogram. Tried calling tech support. I'm in a loop hell hole with automated messages. I can't get a human to help me.
title: UNRELIABLE!! Don't Waste your money!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nancy
content: I have all Ring cameras so benefit to have this one with the others all under one app. Notifications were quick and detected motion perfectly. The stick up camera is double the price and not worth it for what I need it for. I dont need a little wider view, i just moved the camera back a little lol.
title: Works Great and Quick Notifications

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kevin Walker
content: I was amazed at how good the picture is and how the design allows for almost unlimited options for mounting including allowing for "upside down" mounting with the option to invert the picture to "right side up."
title: Excellent picture!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Julia
content: I really like the new indoor ring camera. The picture quality is fantastic.  Intergraded seamlessly with my other ring devices. Great night vision. My only complaint is that the connection on the bottom of the camera where the power cord plugs in is so loose that it’s very difficult to get a good connection at times or the plug just falls out.  That’s why the 3 stars, otherwise I would have given 5.
title: Loose power cord connection

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sergey Romanovsky
content: If you are planning to use this cam inside of your house beware of the fact that if you "Disarm" Ring or set it to "Home and Armed" mode it will not stop the camera from recording. You can disable notifications though. But the cam will keep recording you passing by through the kitchen 50 times a day.
title: Can’t disable recording when unarmed

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shannon E Dockery
content: This gives me great peace of mind when I can check in on my dog when i am out of town. He has auto feeders and water and a dog door so when I have to be gone overnight I can still make sure he is a ok and he gets to stay comfortably at home where he prefers.
title: A monitor for my four legged boy!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Pam Swearingen
content: I liked that the device works birth inspires and outdoors. Very sturdy outdoors even in the rain. Although I did put a little plastic bag as an umbrella over it to keep the rain off the lens. I also like the ability to change settings such as “Motion Sensitivity”. But I wish that particular setting could be desensitized even more. The alarm still goes off on super windy days.
title: Small, but Mighty!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mike and Jennifer
content: Had a hard time keeping it online. Added the ring chime pro. It helped with the signal but not connection. The power went out and now I cant get it to go into set up mode. Perfect my return window closed 3 days ago. So I stuck with this junk.
title: Wont stay connected

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: B. Walker
content: Returned for a replacement. The video is pretty decent for a $59 camera and the audio is clear. Unfortunately the 2 way audio quit working within about 15 days. Tried every troubleshooting there is. Talked with customer service and they patched in and experienced the same problem. They told me to return to Amazon since it was within the 30 day window. Hopefully the next one will not be a dud.
title: 2 way audio quit working in about 2 weeks

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: T. Trentler
content: The ring works well and has a nice picture.  I like the fact that I can see the camera on my fire TV.  The 2 way audio is poor though.  The speaker that is built into the unit is very tiny and the audio quality is horrible.  The mic on the other hand seem to pick up conversations very well.
title: Bad drive thru speaker

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kathy McCall
content: I bought this because my 93 yr old mother insisted on living alone after my dad passed. Since I live over 1/2 hour away, I wanted to be sure I kept an eye on her to be sure she was safe.  Every time she moves out of her room, I am notified and if I want to see what is going on, or even listen, this little camera allows it!
title: works great

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SRaimo
content: This thing doesn’t work. It hasn’t worked since the day I got it, I am angry ....and now I have some broken piece of garbage I can’t even exchange.
title: Never worked

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Salvador
content: Simple to set up works great  plugs straight to a outlet so no battery issues.
title: Simple

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kevin L Webster
content: I already have a Ring alarm system and a Ring doorbell, but wanted to add an indoor camera to monitor what’s happening inside my home. The camera was easy to set up and add to the alarm system via my Ring app on my phone. The daytime HD picture is awesome and the nighttime picture is fairly good. I was able to set the camera’s motion detection to turn on when my alarm system is activated and turn off when the alarm system is deactivated. I plan on purchasing another one for downstairs and a couple of outdoor cameras to monitor what’s happening outside my home.
title: Excellent camera that integrates well into your Ring alarm system.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Marty Smith
content: Bought this to put in my grandkids playroom so when we are cooking in the kitchen or watching tv in the back room, we can see what they are up to without going through the house.  Works perfectly.  Can even talk to the kids via the cam so it works out.  It is really close to my mesh wifi speaker in that room, so no issues with wife.
title: Works perfectly

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
content: Perfect!!! Night vision extremely is vivid!!! Sound has amazing quality... outstanding!!! Exactly what We needed for a sound mind.
title: Extremely happy with this little camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: EmOr
content: I pay $30.00 a year for my doorbell ring camera, so now I have added the indoor camera and you want $70.00 more for the 2nd camera per year or I can only use it for live view??? Wish I had relized that before the time to send it back was over! Makes the 2nd one a total waste of money!!
title: 2nd camera total waste of money!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: scibberas
content: I was trying to use it at my moms she lives across the street, she doesn't have internet so I was trying to use it off of mine it worked when it wanted I need to get her internet but in my house it works great and has a nice wide lens I can see the whole room !!!
title: great little camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SA26
content: I’m leaving for a month trip. Set this up a few days ago and it was working fine. Plug it into the same outlet today and it’s completely dead. Troubleshooting with support does not help. Waste of time and a terrible product. How can it protect your home if it doesn’t even turn on?!
title: Doesn’t work! Dead on second use, after a few days!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: L. Honea
content: Camera losses wifi connection at least once a week. It is approximately 15 feet from wifi access point. It takes multiple restarts of camera to reconnect then it will disconnect a few days later. I am satisfied with the Ring security system but this camera has not worked properly.
title: Lost connection repeatedly

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Vicki G Ward
content: I use my ring cameras to check in on my dog when I’m at work. The video quality is much better than my PetChatz. I put a piece of black tape over the lights bc I don’t want the dog walker knowing when the camera is on and I’m watching or not.
title: Watch the dog and his walker w this great camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Melissa K
content: Super easy to setup. I bought the other indoor cam that is battery or plugin and it’s impossible to setup. This one was way easy.
title: Super easy to setup and start using.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tricia whitehead
content: I have two Rings which have totally stopped working. We put in a new modem and reset all our wireless devices with no problem. Ring cams will not work no matter how many times I've tried and reset the modem. So, waste of money. Also, the corded camera - the cord is really stiff and won't let you adjust the direction of camera very well. overall disappointed.
title: Worked okay for awhile ...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Trevor L
content: This thing is awesome. I was going to get a cheaper chinese cam, but after reading reviews on how sketchy they are, I went with ring. After five months of being at home with my dog during Covid, this helps my separation anxiety while I’m at work  It’s small enough to not be super noticeable, the app is super user friendly, and the video quality is better than expected.
title: Size, video quality, user friendly app

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jay Arthur
content: My condo is 90 miles away. It will not reset itself unless I'm in the room with my phone. It will not reset remotely. Keeps trying to connect to a Ring network, not my local network. Ring support shows similar problems with anyone trying to use camera for remote monitoring. Cannot recommend if you want to do anything remotely.
title: Camera will not reconnect to Wifi when power outage

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dennis
content: Easy to hook up, very good reception I would highly recommend.
title: Ring Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alaska Jewls
content: These are the best I've had! Super easy to setup. Took maybe 2 minutes to add and sync with my ring system. Simple scan and go. I love these cameras!! Clear, great volume, and speakers.  I will replace all old cameras with these.
title: Best plug camera I've ever owned.  I have tried10 different ones.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Vegaboy
