content: Well I had high hopes for these little guys but I'm actually quite disappointed. The recording quality is downright pathetic. On both of them. So I know it's not just a faulty camera. well I get the rare occasion where it does get a good quality recording I am impressed but unfortunately it is too far and few between. I might be packing these up and returning them.
title: I would wait for improvement

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amazon Customer - Millamoo
content: Great problem. The only 2 issues I have with Ring products so far is the talk function and connectivity. Talking is a chore bc you can't understand the other person well. It seems to distort the picture and clarity. Also, you have to take care to not talk over each other (which is easy to do w the slight delay). Otherwise, the distortion and delay get really bad. The connectivity is an issue often enough where you think maybe it's your phone that can't connect, but I think it's really the camera.
title: Great to keep an eye out. Not great for communication.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: VetNurse
content: Great for when we are not home and need to check on our resident cats or the foster babies. Easy to install, use, and monitor.
title: Wonderful for keeping tabs on the foster kittens

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Josh Aldridge
content: I ordered this camera for my dads apartment. It is fantastic! The night vision is great, and the motion detection works very well. Will be ordering some for my home as well!
title: Great Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Msk4
content: Easiest to install I'm loving ring product so much more then anything else I already have a ring door camera and will definitely be ordering ring stick cams as well! HD quality love it only wish they were sold in black as well
title: Small little thing but powerful

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Aban G.
content: Great product, amazing picture, and detects the smallest of motion which is great! I currently have it placed indoors as it is intended and everything runs smoothly with the app and mode changes! I definitely recommend this product. Worth every penny!
title: Amazing! Worth every penny! Definitely recommend!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Trail
content: Love these cameras for inside security and keeping an eye on pets while away from home. The app is easy to use, cameras are easy to install. Really wish the cords were longer.. They have the ability to mount to ceiling, but due to short wiring, couldn't work in desired space. If you wanted to hard wire, it wouldn't be a problem. We just didn't have time for that initially.
title: Short cord, overall great product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Candace M. Clarke
content: I love the Ring product line.  I have the Ring doorbell and love it so I decided to try the indoor security camera to replace the current one I have.  The notifications and motion sensor are perfect to get your attention if your not viewing the screen at the moment.  I absolutely love it; great quality and very easy setup!  I would recommend this product to anyone.
title: Home Security

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nancy Calcagno
content: I love the camera.  I did report to Ring that intermittently there is a loud static noise that emits from the camera.  I have to say the tech that I spoke to did not fix the problem.  I had to disconnect my camera because what good is it if this loud static noise comes out of the camera.  It interrupts us watching the tv as well as scares us.  If you cam find a fix for this I would love to hear what to do.  Again, I have been in touch with Ring and they weren't able to resolve the problem
title: Loud static noise reported

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shananigans
content: Finally one that works with my google wifi. The picture quality is great and everything is good except I wish I can control the angle and move the camera around with my ring app. Other than that everything is good with this indoor security camera
title: Works with google wifi!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
content: Kept losing the internet, despite it being in line of sight. / doesn't perform any better than my Wyze, which is half the price, has no problems with internet, and has an onboard sd card, so no outside monitoring service is needed. Easy set up so I gave it three stars.
title: Nothing new here

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Michael Cook
content: So easy to hook up.. needed to catch a thief in my home when I wasn’t home!  I sure did.. my little thief Bailey... I was shocked it was my puppy!!!  It’s nice to check in on my animals... and to listen in on my roommate talking smack about me!!
title: Smile your on candid camera!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: poufrederick
content: This is fantastic and very easy to set up. I enjoy the clarity of the videos and how easy it is to use. Great addition to the house.
title: Easy to use

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: GEORGE KTM
content: The USB port at the back of the camera is not great the cable is not snug in tight, will come off very easily at the slightest motion to the camera. Received few false motion notifications.. maybe it’s the sun light making some shadows move? WiFi is ok but not the best sometimes once you get the notification, it takes minutes to actually get to the screen where you can see what’s happening.. ( lag time) but overall not a bad camera !
title: Loose contact for the connection port ..

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JoanM
content: I have several nestcams and really use the continuous recording feature a lot.  Even if no motion is detected, you can still go back to any point in time to see what was going on.  I've been told by support that this feature is coming to the Ring Indoor Cam.  I hope it's true.  It's a good little camera otherwise.  I have mine pointing outside through the window into my backyard.
title: Waiting for continuous recording feature

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Twin
content: Should have a more stable base to hold properly on surface, but otherwise works great hate that I have to pay monthly fee again to keep the video feed. Shows clearly and motion detector picks up every time.
title: Worth the buy.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kara LaMarca
content: Super easy to install and use. The cost per month for one device vs all devices is so reasonable. I actually found out I sleep walk and caught my daughter up a few times with the night vision.
title: Reasonably priced

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: InPink&Heels
content: Really good addition to my existing Ring fam, it’s smaller than the wireless ring, but every bit as powerful. Cord is a nice length and hook up was flawless. I’m looking to purchase one more in the near future.
title: Happy

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: millersnmeva
content: I am alittle disappointed with the clarity and trying to talk through this camera is awful.  If I try and have a conversation with my wife she just calls me the quality is so bad. Sound like a robot.  I bought this to keep an eye on my dog but it has to be close otherwise the clarity stinks.
title: If you just want motion detection buy this.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: steve sullivan
content: Tried to use this as a baby monitor, horrible lag time and even worse imaging. I own multiple ring products and am happy with each one. This just missed the mark as a baby monitor. If you’re looking to use this as a baby monitor don’t!!
title: NOT A BABY MONITOR!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Richard F.
content: Only issue is for a day or two it was recording motion all night long in the room where there was no motion. Seems a firmware update may have fixed it as it is no longer doing it. I really want the ability to turn motion on and off based on my being home or not and when I go to sleep until I wake up. Please get this soon.
title: Decent camera for the money.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Martha Martinez
content: Good. Easy to install. We already have ring in our home so it was easy to set up! It has a good range and it’s clear. We bought it for our kitchen since our kids are doing school from home. We keep an eye out lol. 2 way voice. Love it.
title: Easy to install. Perfect.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jessica Moreno
content: My dog just had puppies thankfully I was able to feel safe when I’m not home . I love that I can speak to my dog and I really like that it has night vision . Best purchase I made so far . You can put a price on your privacy thanks ring
title: Great protection

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Diane Cole
content: Love Ring products.  Replaced indoor camera with Ring.  The night vision is great.  No problems with set up.  Many features that are useful.  Can pause recording inside when at home !! They keep improving.
title: Video quality is awesome.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Michigan Mom
content: This product was very easy to set up if you can follow step by step directions. There are some steps you may skip and return to later.  It worked nicely and when I unplugged it, it took only a minute to reconfigure when plugged in again.
title: Easy peasy setup for the internal camera with established Ring doorbell

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kowal3sm
content: Great camera especially considering the low price. Does everything as expected. My only complaint is after about 9 months the video now has a yellowish-green hue.  Would expect the lens to last longer.
title: Great little cam, color fades over time.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nathan Robison
content: Great product!  Has sound too!  The only issue that I’ve had with this device in my bedroom is when I’m away from home I have a REALLY hard time connecting...  which is MOST of the reason why I bought it do that I could keep an eye on my personal belongings. I recommend it whole heartedly only if you have full control of your router.  Otherwise there is no point in spending so much money.
title: Great product!  Connection could be problematic

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dustin
content: Pros: easy to install, simple design, video quality is good, capture angle is a little wider than the stick up cam. The app’s ability to customize between home and away mode gives more option for user. Cons: motion detection is too sensitive and it gets very annoying when you get notification after every move it detects. So I suggest you manually customize the angles it can detect.
title: Better camera than most brands...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: noemi
content: This camera is perfect for anyone seeking camera security on a rental property. I actually use this indoor camera facing my backyard. There are settings in the camera that reduces the reflection from the window. Totally worth the money!
title: Perfect camera for a rental property

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mark Courson
content: We added this cam to supplement our floodlight cameras. We point this camera thru an living room window outside so it works like a ring doorbell, giving us a great view of an outside gate entrance. We can turn it around to see our dogs sitting on the couch if we want to that option. A good value for sure
title: Indoor cam works great

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: georgia
content: I ordered this ring cam to place in our living room because we have the doorbell and the spotlight, I regret buying it as the live view is unreliable.  Not only is it unreliable after a few months it stopped working completely.  The return window has closed I would have otherwise returned it.  We have good wifi signals and the other 2 Ring devices have live view that work.  Do not purchase this product!
title: Live view option unreliable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RC
content: Selling my data? I am so upset I will not purchase another Ring product again. I will be cancelling my account to store data, disposing of my devices. My return window ran out on January 31st😡
title: Privacy my posterior

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tom Kerr
content: Works great...once you get it set up. I got so frustrated that I almost boxed it up and sent it back. Pro tip: during set up, the device needs to be VERY close to your WiFi router. Set it up first, and then position it where you want it.
title: Difficult set-up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jenny
content: Beautiful picture! So much more clear than my other cameras I've purchased. Very impressed with how easy it was to set up and activate...easy to use with my echo. Only disappointment is the app... There's no widget and no love view on the homepage.
title: Only 1 negative

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Charles R. Yates
content: Turning it off remotely is almost impossible or too hard to discover. It should be much easier.
title: A good camera with poor in-app on/off control.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Annie
content: I didn't realize you have to purchase a subscription to see ALL recordings—all this does is let you see a live view.  Other solutions like Arlo let you view/save motion recordings for 7 days.  I'll be returning all of my Ring cameras and switching to Arlo.
title: Useless without $100/year subscription

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Teresa S.
content: Have no particular likes or dislikes. It works as expected. I’m not a 5 star giver unless it blows my mind. I definitely would recommend. A note videos will not be able to be viewed without buying the ring storage. I think that with all of my ring purchases was my biggest disappointment.
title: Works as expected

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Helen B.
content: This camera's night vision is way better than my cox camera. Loving it.
title: It has to be close to your Wi-Fi.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TR Dunne
content: Audio on play back is sketchy. Sometimes the audio is very clear and clean then suddenly it's noisy and static filled, then back again. Irritating. But picture motion detection are quite excellent.
title: Easy To Set Up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mystic Kay
content: Best Buy yet, bought this to keep an eye on my brother who has autism while he’s at home alone. The two way speak is great to talk in real time and we can monitor his sleep patterns at night. Also works for confusing the dog too.
title: Another set of eyes

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Courtney Cannon
content: I love this little camera it's an inexpensive and good quality indoor camera that gets the job done. We use this camera in our two-year-olds room to let us keep an eye on her while she plays independently or to check on her when she's napping or asleep.
title: Great indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: amamunsrk
content: For indoor camera  user for Nest over years decide to give a try Ring indoor . Overall ok camera . Wish had little more weight on it while it sit on the counter , it’s tilt sidewise because it’s light . Small & compact camera , will get the job done . Expected better quality build . Maybe will keep using the Nest .
title: Will get the Job done , Nest is Better !!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dionysus
content: The camera is a part of the best home security, in terms of system features, accessories, software, and integration. I have about 20 devices all managed by the Ring app and they work together flawlessly. The only gripe, as always, is that one cannot schedule off footage upload. Not a biggie.
title: Consistent Ring quality and ecosystem!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Frank Newberry
content: I have my whole house protected by ring along with my camper.  If you purchase the in-home alarm you can make your inside cameras only come on when you are away from the house.  That is how I have my indoor camera and it is great.
title: Love Ring Products

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Daniel Carroll
content: My only complaint is that you must pay to be able to store the video. Otherwise, it is live view only. (Makes presenting evidence of something they saw hard, and it means you miss what happened if you can’t answer motion detection. Once you add the $100/year plan you get active monitoring and unlimited backups of the video. (Only one subscription of $100 is required per home for unlimited cameras)
title: Great Quality, Cheap Price, Subscription Reccomended

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kim Mapes
content: I’ve had this device less than 3 months and having problems with it.  I’ve done everything I can to reconnect it and it will not function… I have chatted with customer support and spoken to customer support and no one seems to have any advice or know what to do. I’ve contacted them about a warranty and no one will return my messages either. I would not recommend purchasing. Customer service is no help if anything goes wrong.
title: Will not buy a Ring product again

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: The Pyners
content: This camera works great. It is exactly what we needed. The video is clear and the camera covers a wide angle. The camera itselv is smaller which makes it easy to place and hide if needed. I am slowly getting all the ring products for my home. They are top quality!
title: Great camera at a good price

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: HELEN GUNN
content: We bought a total of 4 Rings.  We use it daily.  I like that you can set the camera to pick up only people.  Before we were picking up the bushes moving, dogs, cats, birds, and insects.  We have them in the front and backyard.
title: We love it

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Josh
content: Unfortunately as good as the camera is the speaker is horrible. Can not hear a thing on this. Will be returning.
title: Terrible Sound

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joey the Photog
content: Considering the low price tag this camera has, I'm very satisfied with it and it has excellent picture quality. The picture you see there is out of my apartment Window. Also, it integrates perfectly with my complete ring security system that I have in my apartment. I highly recommend it.
title: Excellent camera at a budget price.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CamoPrincess
content: I wasn't sure of this product HOWEVER it is without a doubt a product that I can utilize from my phone and it never lets me down.
title: Wasn't sure

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: T money
content: I didn’t open the box yet. Something about the box looks fake, like the counterfeit Apple AirPods  people sell on canal street in NY.  I think I’m going to return it and just purchase straight from Ring.
title: Box looks counterfeit

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tyrone
content: When it worked was really nice.......  After 1 week when tapping go live, just says activating and never goes live.....  deleted cams from app and re-installed works for 20 min then goes back to not being able to go to live view......  already thru out boxes so can’t return, now basically worthless paper weight....
title: Worked for 1 week now unreliable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Marie
content: I bought this so I could watch my recently adopted rescue dog while at work to make sure she wasn’t destroying anything or barking too much... and because I just missed her :) it works great and I love being able to check in on my pets. I also like the security aspect- the ring sticker on our front door is a deterrent for any burglars.
title: Excellent pet camera and home security camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Beana
content: It's helpful in watching what's going on while away or in another room. Sound is pretty clear, picture is very clear (daytime and night vision).  Overall, I am happy with the functionality of this camera and the quality.
title: It's dependable

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: B. Calo
content: It worked great the first week, but since then I  have had to reset the router every night to get the camera online again. Keeps going offline regardless of where I place the router. I think they do this purposefully so you have to buy the extender. Disappointing.
title: Disappointed performance

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Gregg M
content: Like with all ring devices this was very easy to set up. I also like that they have added different modes so that way I can put it on the Home mode and this does not record while I’m at home.
title: Easy to set up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Courtney
content: I wanted these for security cameras when I'm not home and they work great. I always get a notification when there's motion and it even alerts me of surrounding neighborhood alerts, such as a fire nearby. Easy to set up and assemble. I just wish the cord was longer and you could rotate the camera around.
title: Exactly what I wanted.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: HW55
content: What a shame! 2 houses full of these and now I have to talk to India! your value has sunk! And what a HUGE disappointment! 1/2 hour hold times then calls drop, every successful company has to cheapen their product and then  sub- out customer service to India to save money! In the end Broken English and Bad phone lines cost you! The consumer doesn't want to get jerked around!
title: Customer Service sinking faster than the Titanic!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nb
content: Had to return because the app didn't work with my dad's phone (galaxy s7 that was made in Brazil). As it was a gift for my parents house, I had to return. Would be good to know beforehand that that ring app doesn't work with phones made in certain countries.
title: Had to return

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jennifer E.
content: Good camera.  I've had a couple generic security cameras around our house and I will say the voice and picture quality on this camera are great.  I like the fact it syncs up with my Ring system.  I do wish this had an ethernet port on it, also wish I could rotate the camera around to view different areas of a room.  Otherwise it's a great little camera.
title: Great camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Roxanne Stone
content: We love our ring camera! It has a wide span for the camera range and detects even the smallest motion. The picture quality is very good and it is a nice feature you can talk into the camera from your phone and live view!
title: Love!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: tanisha barona
content: Some far so good. Happy with this purchase.  Installation was easy and quick. Had a little trouble connecting to my home WiFi initially, but that was my fault. Must be on the 2g network to connect. Image/video/audio display quality is great. I have mine mounted the living room wall. Downloaded the Ring app to my mobile device, now I can check in on home at any time of the day.
title: Peace of mind!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Camila Colorio
content: It worked for a minute and stopped working, called customer service and they offered a replacement. But now I have to wait a week to get a new one and I needed for yesterday! :(
title: Stopped working

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Andrew
content: I use this alongside a number of other ring cameras in and around our house. The size is great and picture quality is very good. I wish the volume was a little louder on this as well as most of the ring products but it’s ok.
title: No very loud but a good product overall.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mochachip2016
content: I have mine in a window and at night the pics aren’t clear even though they have several settings to address window glare
title: Not the best for window use

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: O.
content: Does exactly what it is advertised to do. I use it to keep tabs on my vacant properties. Sometimes will trigger false motion alerts (if a cars lights go by) but I believe you can adjust the sensitivity.  A great product that provides me with peace of mind.
title: Great product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ashley
content: I’m a big fan of Ring products. I own the doorbell pro. I got these because I felt like I needed a little bit more security for the house. The setup is a breeze. Picture quality for night and day time is great. I got 5 of these to cover my whole house. I’m very impressed with this little camera. I can check in at any time on my family and home while away at work.
title: Worth it!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lupa
content: I’m having a lot of trouble with this camera. I have the best internet connections and it goes offline and so does not record or do anything.
title: It’s very good, good quality and worth every penny.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: annexpub
content: Not at all reliable. After 8-9 months they are degrading, missing events and are down right unreliable. Poor lighting and video quality, clunky app and poor connectivity with devices in VERY close proximity. Invest elsewhere.
title: Not great

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lulu
content: I had to replace one, it wouldn’t stay connected to WiFi after 2 months.  Hopefully the replacement will work
title: Only time will tell

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: D.J. M.
content: Very easy to set up! Not complicated at all! I recently loss my wife😭 she was a homemaker, always was home to take care of my 2 Weimaraners. Now, I have no one to watch if I need to go out for work, shopping, etc. Thank you for an AWESOME PRODUCT! Thank you
title: I now can keep an eye on my 2 Weimaraners while I’m gone!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Brian
content: Be sure you have unlimited data on my home internet package.  If not, you'll blow through your data and get huge charges! There is no way to decrease quality so it's full data all the time. The only way to fix it is to decrease sensitivity so far that I get no security/motion events....
title: Read the fine print regarding wifi data

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ycarazana
content: Muy buena. Para el precio es excelente, muchos comentarios hablan del problema del audio cuando hablas directamente es muy malo, pero la calidad de la imagen es muy buena y funciona de maravilla no se puede pedir mas para ese precio
title: Exelente

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kelsey Bauman
content: Love this, it is perfect in our bonus room to be able to watch our pup while we aren’t home! Works great and I always recording even if you aren’t on the app so you can go back and watch
title: Great indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bob
content: Got 2 of these cameras. one work good since it was  20 ft from the router. the other one was 60 feet away and would lose connection every 2 days.  the camera antennae seems to be weak since it only accepts 2.4 signal.
title: works good only with good wifi close by

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Alex the Amazonian
content: Pros ⬇️ High resolution video Easy setup Versatile connectivity Wallet friendly price Cons ⬇️ No cons found ———————— I highly recommend this camera.
title: Perfect!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: hENRY KAPGAN
content: I had difficulty to set it up- the light would not come on.  Finally it worked and I thought I set it up.  When I tried to install it in the living room the unit would not power up.
title: Product did not work from the start

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Y Naser
content: Does a pretty good job. Has some tweaks. Such as there is no way to turn it off and on from the camera itself. You need to go to the actual app and make those adjustments. At this moment I simply cover the camera with a bandana or a turn the camera around. I make it work. Looking forward to other cameras.
title: These cameras work!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lance(Bullet)White
content: i could not believe the quality of the picture in total darkness
title: these are really great products

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Arquiel
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I love the camera,  installation super easy, camera functions are just so right, WiFi, motions, night view camera everything works exelente
title: Super worth it!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: G. Denis
content: Works better than expected. If you are wondering if you can use it outdoors... You can. Just make sure it's not in a place where it will get wet ect ect... Easy to install and the picture is not bad at all. Highly recommended!
title: Easy to install, easy to use, easy to mount!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BrwnBaby
content: This camera is great! I use it for my son room. It has a speaker and the visuals are clear cut. Just be mindful there’s a subscription if u want it to save all activity after free trial period.
title: Great camera! Don't forget subscription!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AFranceschi
content: I should’ve got the rechargeable battery set, but other than that I like it. I didn’t think it would be a big deal to have the plug in ones, but it makes a difference. I mounted them with a large Command strip instead of screwing them into the wall. It works great. I use them to check on my cats and whenever maintenance enters our home without us.
title: No issues, wish I would’ve paid extra for the rechargeable battery version.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Brady
content: Video quality is good. It’s nice to keep an eye on my doggies when we aren’t home. Always good for peace of mind for intruders also since we do live in the city. Great price, great value. $30 subscription for the whole year / per camera... good deal
title: Good video quality, great value. PEACE OF MIND!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Larissa Carolina
content: I already have the Ring door bell camera so I already know how it is a great product and very easy to use. Excellent night vision. I love that it is just $3 a month and it record everything that the motion sense get. So cheap for the best camera on the marketplace
title: Don’t wait! BUY IT!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joan G. Zakrzewski
content: This is the best indoor camera I have ever had.  I love how it records when motion takes place and I can go back and see what happened.  The night vision is excellent.  I have al ready bought more of these.
title: Best indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: jo ann flores
content: It worked great for like 25 days then it would not connect to wifi tried for like three days finally gave up and returned the product
title: B

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Glenn Courson
content: Works great for indoor use. I use to keep an eye on my German Shepard. The 2 way audio is great and picture is super clear. I wish the plug was a little longer, but that’s my only complaint. Great addition to my Ring cams.
title: Works great for dog cam!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bruce Izzi
content: I love that I can keep an eye on my two aging dogs with confidence! I can check on them 24/7 when I am at work.
title: The picture quality is excellent

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Barry Mitchell
content: Great for watching the kids , just turn motion alarm off or you’ll go crazy. Great picture quality, super easy setup
title: Love it

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JusAMom
content: Lags super bad whether it’s on WiFi or Data. Set up was painful. It kept resetting itself. The cord falls out continuously as well. Returning it today. (This is the second one we bought. The first one we returned because it was defective.)
title: Horrible lag!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: cayo largo II
content: It would be if it worked all this is two camera in two week to cover a small area inside the house it almost seems that quality is out the door
title: Camera does not light up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joseph A Monahan
content: I had a WYZE pan cam for 6 mos, it would not stay connected . Continually rebooting and resetting itself.  Their customer support , non existent .  This RING camera was breeze to set up , and app interface is flawless as well.  Use CAM to watch pets when out as well as doors.  Really cool in size and great live stream
title: Awesome little indoor CAM

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Johnny
content: I somehow missed were it said you have to pay for a monthly subscription. This is like saying you will pay through the nose to be able to save or view what was recorded unless you agree to the terms of service to pay, pay, pay.......
title: VERY DISAPOINTED

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Andrea Fletcher
content: This product is wonderful for its price point and what it does. We use ours as dog cameras to keep track of what our pets are doing while we aren’t home. I love being able to “talk” to them while not there. Great product!
title: Definitely recommend

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Julie SAL
content: One camera did not work. However ring support is replacing immediately .. The motion sensor seems a little glitchy but maybe once it get it completely installed with my whole system it will work better.
title: Ok

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: momof4boys
content: First one didn’t survive the move, ring customer support sent out a replacement and now we are back in business! Great video and ease of use!
title: Great camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Primalfear
content: Great cameras but the two way audio is useless. It’s great as far as the camera itself goes. Night vision is excellent as well. The audio quality is garbage though and that is as important to me as the picture quality.
title: If you need two way audio- do not spend the money on these.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
content: This is ridiculous what's the point of a camera if it keeps on disconnecting from Wi-Fi when you need it the most I am returning my order and getting my money back.
title: Cannot connect to Wi-Fi when Wi-Fi is 3 ft from the device

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: jacquelyn
content: This is such a great camera. Setup was so easy. This is replacing an older zmodo camera and it's great! I need it mostly to monitor my 4 dogs but it's good you can hear sound in the room and also talk. I'm going to order more!
title: This is an awesome camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: W. T. Traylor
content: This camera is small and was added to my Ring security system. The picture quality is very good.  I wish I could pan with it, but it works the way that it is.
title: Very nice camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ashley & Kelly
content: Pretty quality product overall. The clarity of the picture could be better for a Ring product. It's not as clear as some cheaper indoor cam options. The volume is lower than I would like on it.
title: Pretty good

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Erin K
content: Really enjoying the 2 cameras I have... Ring doorbell and then another one for my daughter's room (like a baby monitor). Easy to set up, and super easy to toggle from the 2 cameras on the app.
title: Easy SetUp & Great Linking with the App

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: EdM
content: This AC powered camera & motion detector is a great deal. For $59, you get a wide angle camera with motion detection. All the battery powered Ring stuff is about 3X more expensive. Installation was easy. You do have to pay for a Ring on-line account, but the 1 camera account is not expensive. I am very satisfied
title: remarkable video clarity and motion detection

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Moving to the Florida Beach
content: Just bought a 2nd one. Did not work, right out of box.
title: No power

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: susan
content: So far, so good.  I just got the indoor camera yesterday.  It was so easy to set up.  I have had a ring doorbell on my front door for a couple of years now and love it.
title: So far, so good!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Vanessa
content: Super happy with my ring camera. We have the doorbell as well and I can’t say enough about the peace of mind these products give me. We just recently decided to get an indoor camera to watch over our dogs during the day but also turn towards our back door being that we don’t have a doorbell for back there yet. Picture quality is amazing! The only thing that I don’t really like is that it is a bit delayed compared to the doorbell but it is exactly what we wanted and needed to ensure the safety of our home. Would recommend the ring products to anyone!
title: Would recommend to anyone looking for a peace of mind when away from home!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: C2CPILOT
content: As soon as the trial subscription stops, so does the device.  I have several Yi cameras that still record video and link up much better than Ring at a fraction of the cost.  If I had it to do over again I would not buy the Ring.
title: Great as long as you buy the service, otherwise they stop working.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Michael DiSandro
content: Works great and picture and video quality is way better then I expected.
title: Nice Device

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dorothy Edwards
content: I got to keep track of indoor pets. I have a ring system that monitors the doors and motion. I have small pets and the 5lb does not set off the notification but the 9lb does. I wish there was more than 2 hours that could turn off notice...if there is I have not discovered it. I am having a contractor do some work when I am not at home and will use the camera to monitor.
title: Keeps an eye out when not at home

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Src1975
content: I have yet to install them, but I have been cautious due to recent media.  Dual security appears to really work.  I’ll point them to low traffic areas to reduce triggering.  I’m confident they’ll work without problem.
title: Cautiously optimistic!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Daskryptonian
content: The camera works great! Motion sensors and video quality are all good. The only thing I wish it did do was rotate. I bought an off-brand camera that could and figured that this one would too. Other than that, great indoor camera to go along with all of your other RING devices.
title: Great Camera, just missing one feature

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: J_S_S
content: I this product. It works great, and I was so impressed with the night vision and motion detection. The quality of the video is great, even in my dark basement.
title: Great quality of video, even at night. Great motion detection.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Megan Hunter
content: The cameras have great motion detection and notifications. The vision range is great. The mounting could be a better with more options. I suggest getting getting subscription. It worth the money!
title: Good camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Don
content: keeps going off line and have to put it back on now it won’t go into set up mode don’t like these at all there’s nothing like the indoor outdoor cam Since I posted this post Ring has contacted me and replaced my cams and made sure everything was working perfect for me
title: Junk but ring mad everything good

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jean
content: Setup was so fast, then the firmware updates and the camera dies.  Called Amazon and they connected me with Ring. Yes it is dead so they send another one. Same thing happened with the second one. Shipping both back and will not get another. I have a Ring doorbell and it works great. Disappointing to have this happen.
title: Stopped working after firmware update-disappointing

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: paul
content: ring.com has generation 2 for same price that work better.  the video isn't great and it doesn't
title: ring.com has generation 2 for same price that work better.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ELMac
content: EZ setup. Wifi works well. Does not drag down my wifi at all. Small size, about 1¾" wide by 3½" high. My Amcrest 4mp dual band security cams work better in my opinion but about twice the size.
title: EZ setup. Wifi good. Small size.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SOLONY
content: This camera is a little short of amazing.  There is one thing another user mentioned that the camera is so light weight the wired and the power cord are heavier and becomes unplugged easily.  I am getting the battery version which is on the way!
title: Plug doesn't stay connected

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Pammy
content: So far so good , I purchase these cameras for the inside of my home , I have them at several different locations through out and I love them , so far no lagging catches and detects motion as it should !
title: Great spy tool !

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: L. K. Coles
content: These work phenomenally.  Just be careful where you put them. They’re small enough to forget they’re there and whoops  your morning routine is on there.  I bought them to keep track of the dogs.  But where there are dogs, there is me.
title: Amazing little cams

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: David F Albright
content: Went through all the set up procedures as stated and it worked for a moment, then died. Called Ring support and Ring said it was a software and hardware problem, and although it was bought through amazon, they would still take care of the product. They are sending a new one. Rings Cust. service was very helpful, but it would seem this vendor's inventory was questionable - at least with mine.
title: Product from the vendor was defective and didn't work - Ring ended up hnoring their warranty though

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Andrew C
content: Using this as a toddler monitor - we already have a ring doorbell so having one less app for my wife to remember password for is worth it to us. Night vision is easily good enough to keep an eye on our toddler.
title: Does the job, well.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jonathan M Hardison
content: I have this mounted in the garage, and it works great. I have it tied in to control my lights as well, enabling me to turn on/off lights with motion and time. Was surprised at the quality for price of it. Would be nice for the included stand to have a tad bit more motion to it before you have to pay for the optional ceiling/wall mount, but I did get an angle I'm good using without paying for it.
title: Great little camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: X. Mu
content: The cameras were good, nice image quality, lovely 2-way talk, and smooth connection. But I don't think the camera were brand new. First the box came opened, no seal at all...And second, when we tried to use the trial for video recording, the website showed they are on trials and the trial ends on 9/11/20, but today as I am writing the review, it's already 10/19/20..... Anyway, the cameras are working fine, we don't plan to return them though.
title: Good camera, bad amazon service...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lacimartinez
content: When camera is connected it works good, picture is good. The speaking isn't clear from it. Sounds muffled but the worst part is it disconnects from the wifi atleast once a day and that is so annoying
title: disconnects too much

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jesse Bechtold
content: I like these ring cameras. Really easy to setup. Make sure you use the 2.4 and not the 5. Also if you have a larger house I would get a WiFi extender.
title: As advertised

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: O
content: Tried to communicate, unfortunateley the speaker of the camera is not loud enough.
title: Need to improve speaker volume

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: itsmepattywatty
content: no problem activating, simple to use, good coverage
title: will buy more

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jaron Haan
content: If your don't have a smart home and just want a one off camera. This is ok. Unfortunately, I have almost everything in my home integrated. THIS CAMERA INTEGRATES WITH ALMOST NOTHING. I switched over to all Google smart devices to control everything in my house, since they integrate with more than the Alexa that I had for 3 years. Amazon/Ring locked this product down to not integrate with anything else.
title: Research First

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Army Dad
content: Very well made product. Impressed with ease of setup. No issues with connection and video is clear enough. It's not high end HD video but for $50 I can complain as it does what I want with a small footprint.
title: Great small indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Vivian Siafah
content: Product is good but goodness does the motion detection annoy the crop out of you even in home mode. I have to turn the camera towards the wall when I’m home otherwise it Constantly notifies me that there is motion in my living room which is great but can be annoying when home
title: It’s okay

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Leslirene'
content: Great night vision and motion sensitivity.  Drops the wifi signal kind of often which I don't have an issue with on other gadgets, but overall I'm happy with it.
title: Like it,  I'd recommend

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DryGuy
content: Clunky interface for setting up options and the blue light display for motion detection can not be turned off, making stealth mounting for hidden cameras impossible. Price is also high for limited features. No SD card option.
title: No option to disable blue motion light

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Leesa Craven
content: Love this camera! The only downfall is that a blue light comes on when you’re looking at the live camera footage.  Not great as a baby monitor for this reason. Otherwise, it works perfectly!
title: Very nice!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amazon4543
content: Works great, easy set up, WiFi connect speed can be slow, sometimes you need to close out and re-open app to get a connection to live view, otherwise great, adjust level settings and clear enough picture.
title: Works well

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: mua4stars
content: I took off one star for having to purchase a subscription to watch recent activity. Ring doorbell does not work that way. Otherwise, great camera. Lots of options for alerts.
title: Great wide view and doesn’t pixelate a lot when zoomed in.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Oscar DeGrouch
content: I added this to a Ring doorbell “system.”  Simple. Video is HD. Night vision is amazing! Plug it in, add it to your Rind account and app, and you’re done. I’m paying $3/month for video storage. I’m happy!
title: I’m very impressed!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Josh B.
content: I have to set up this camera every day or multiple times a day. It gets disconnect from our WiFi. I have 1GB internet and nothing else in my house ever drops a signal. It won’t even get into setup mode now.
title: Terrible WiFi Connection

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dar
content: I think the camera is great overall but I am disappointed with the length of the cord which limits the places it can be set up.  I didn't want to use the rechargeable battery type because of limited battery life.
title: Short power cord...approximately 6 ft

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bryan L
content: Great picture on the camera. A little disappointed that just like my ring door bell, if I don’t get to my phone as soon as I get an alarm, it is busy and nothing comes up until it is done recording. At least I guess that is the problem. I try to go to the “live picture “ when this happens and it still is busy it seems like, just spins.
title: Great picture but.......

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: marmaxie
content: I purchase this camera so I can check up on my little dog when I am not home.  Plus just to make sure no one has entered my house when I am out. Works good.
title: This camera is compact in size.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Me
content: Run far and fast from ring products.  While they are good, they are rendered useless by their abysmal app and even worse-if that's possible-customer service.
title: Ugh

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Carlos and Grace
content: Ease of installation, just plug and use. Great picture quality but night vision needs improvement.
title: Great addition to the Ring security!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: john
content: NOT GOOD FOR BABY CAM (period) Disconnects from the Alexa Echo that I have after a brief period and I have to keep telling Alexa to show me and sometimes there is an issue where it doesnt let me see. This may be a problem with Alexa Echo - not sure. If you wan a fun toy that you need to have your mobile phone on (and charging so your battery doesnt run out) then this is the spy cam for you.
title: eh...

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angie  Dugan
content: Great little camera. I am using it to keep an eye on my dogs during the day. Has a fantastic picture/video!  You can’t go wrong with Ring products.
title: Very happy with this camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Elizabeth Johnson
content: We ordered this and had to immediately return. The night vision wasn’t great and it continuously disconnected from the internet. Had to set it up several times from scratch and it wasn’t more than 30 feet from my router.
title: Don’t waste your money.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Russell Brown
content: Have several of these around my house. Amazing how well they record in low light times. So convenient having access to all these cameras from one application.
title: A must-have for a complete surveillance solution

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jonathan Wrzesniewsky
content: Worked great after i set it up the first time. However i am not able to get it through the setup mode in another location and i give up. I will not buy another EVER!
title: Do not buy this piece of crap

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: LMF
content: I love these little cameras! They connected pretty much instantly through my existing ring account and to my Wi-Fi. They are great for keeping an eye on my foster fur babies and to keep an eye on the entry common area from the inside when I'm not home.
title: Fantastic option with easy set up!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jerlie Chavit
content: Love this item. Good for my peace of mind. Good coverage. Love it causes my brother bought one for dad’s bedroom and will be delivered on Monday, June 8th🥰
title: Love my Ring product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lisette Fimian
content: I returned mine because the part that plugs into the back of the camera would not stay; it kept falling out! Now I'm reading several articles where this camera has been hacked. That is (((scary)))! I won't be getting a new one.
title: Far from perfect.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CR
content: Has potential nice design but extremely disappointed with this camera video slow & choppy, No SD card slot to store videos, only live watch after promo which costs per camera… No Thank You..!!
title: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BonnieBlu
content: Well designed product. Very easy setup. Ring software is very easy to use. Video quality is good. I honestly haven’t gotten a Ring product yet that hasn’t performed well.
title: Easy to use indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amanuel Haile
content: Very good unit when room light is continuously on or off, it is funky when camera is in a room with lights off and someone turns on and walks in- no motion detection until the photo sensor adjusts to the ambience. Very disturbing glitch !!!
title: Great unit with serious glitch

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: jla89
content: Product falls in line with the other Ring products. Connects easily. Very simple to use. Can watch your pet while you're at work!
title: Easy to setup, easy to use!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shivam Patel
content: Motion sensor tends to get annoying after a while, but better safe than sorry. Also WiFi signal drops a few times, but overall great product will probably buy more in the future.
title: Best cameras I’ve used so far

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Morning Girl
content: Love checking in on my Furr babies 😻
title: Great pet watching

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Roberto
content: Have this in my living room, let’s me know while I’m at work what my kids are up to which is always a good thing lol, but great view and easy to install
title: Awesome

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Maneesh Khare
content: Can’t go wrong with Ring products. I bought it as a package with Chamberlain garage opener for enabling Amazon Key delivery. Solid quality, easy integration with Ring App and flawless video and motion detection.
title: Solid construction & Video clarity

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mark A. Halabuda
content: What a great camera for indoor use. Easy to set up and access video/live feed with any device. My intention was to use pointing out a window, moving from room to room depending on where I wanted to monitor. Worked great during daylight hours, at night the camera was reflected in the window (could not see outside). As an indoor security camera it can be moved to any location near an electrical outlet. Great for traveling, can be set up in a hotel room with a WiFi internet connection.
title: Ring Indoor Cam

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: HoosierPa
content: Works well.  It much else to say.  Not very large.  I think this would be best sitting on top a cabinet which is fine.  I don’t see how it would mount well on a wall etc.
title: So far, so good.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kevin Small
content: This worked well when I first got it, install and setup quick and easy. Just past 1 month and the product stop working and I have tried everything including a hard reset, no go. Now I am pass the deadline by 14 days to get a return or get a replacement per the web site. I am sad :-(
title: stop working just past the return date, go figure.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nsulmers
content: I just received it (2-days ago) and I was able to hook it up (plug it in) in seconds.  I followed the instructions for the app, the process took a minute and I was watching myself.  Small enough to hide and can reposition as needed.  It also covers a wide area.  So far so good!
title: Super Easy & Clear Video

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SB
content: Ive been thru (2) camera's and both of them make noise when in a dimely lit room with the TV on... non stop clicking noise every single time.  Id avoid.
title: Avoid - Makes noise

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dedee
content: I can't believe I haven't bought this sooner.  The pixels are great. I can zoom in and check on my pets. The motion setting is great.
title: Why didn't I get this sooner?

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Maurizio
content: Probably the best camera I have from Rong. Works flawlessly. No lag and great WiFi reception. Of course no external walls in the way as this is internal. However, it does exactly what you want it to do and is very discrete in size.
title: Best ring camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RM KIMBALL
content: I WAS SO EXCITED TO GET THIS CAMERA TO USE FOR THE INSIDE OF MY FRONT DOOR ENTRANCE AREA. UNFORTUNATELY, I COULD NOT GET THE DARN THING TO STAY CONNECTED TO MY WIFI ROUTER ANY LONEGERTHAN 5 SECONDS!!! ABSOLUTELY AWFUL EXPERIENCE...  VERY DISAPPOINTED...
title: WILL NOT STAY CONNECTED TO MY WIFI!!!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: mystic
content: I am so impress i can keep am eye out on my puppy while i am upstairs doing my work it works Great thank you so much!! might get another in the near future
title: love this litle guy

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Yen
content: Ring devices are generally great products which is why I bought this security camera even while I have a working Samsung set. These in-door security cameras were easy to setup, clear visual, fast and reliable. I would definitely recommend it.
title: Great Ring product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Harvey Horowitz
content: I purchased this product to monitor my new puppy in his crate. I am impressed with its features and performance. However it takes some effort to learn exactly what it can do and how to use it with the Ring App. The information is available but it is scattered over several different Ring web pages.
title: Good product but it takes some effort to learn how to use it.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: The Tiger Dominator
content: Picture quality is incredible for a small cam. It’s small size also means it fits anywhere plus it’s plug n play functionality with my ring security system means I can move it to any room and just plug it into an outlet and it will be online seconds... p.s. the small size also means you can hide it 😏.
title: Small but big on features

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: John W. Michaels
content: I can keep an eye of the house while I’m away, and add each hussy I bring home to my video collection. High quality video!
title: Great Video Quality for Rewatching

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mom of two teens
content: My dad is at home and I can keep an eye on him on my I phone.  I finally bit the bullet and bought a Ring camera.  I have Alexa too but I leave them both unplugged while we are not using them for privacy.
title: Good for watching my dad when I am out on errands

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CJ
content: The very first week we had it, we received a strange visitor at the door....at 3am!  You can see who is at the door, regardless if you are home or not!  Installs very easy!
title: Great product!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Super techie
content: Good picture for the price. Easy to setup the physical camera. But, the App is not well designed. Has multiple problems. They need a better quality assurance team or should hire external help.
title: Good hardware, software needs work.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cla Go
content: It requires u to spend $3/month to $10/month to use the recording feature. Also, it takes a very very long time for the app to load the live footage. Sometimes minutes!
title: I recommend a different brand and feature

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Julie W
content: we use this to look in on our pets when we are away, it's nice to be able to check on them, and even talk to them if we want to.
title: christmas present

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Davieus gray
content: I like the cameras to keep an eye on kids while at work. As im a truck driver, i can tell you these cameras wont stay connected to wifi signal does matter how close they are to signal or how far. Once you set it up you'll be doing it again within 2 days, then it might work for 2 or 3 more days then stop working again! And on and on. Tried troubleshooting did update and samething. Waste of money
title: waste of money

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: brandyjkwd
content: Worked great for a few weeks and then I switched internet providers and it won’t work. Not satisfied with ring. I have 2 others and you don’t have a lot of options to set it up the way you want, you’re stuck with their set up.
title: Pay more and get the good brand!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Katherine Toth
content: I love the how small they are and the wide view they capture. Very easy to setup, pair to WiFi and app on phone. Though I didnt use the mount option I'm very pleased i have that option
title: Love how small they are!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JExplore13
content: I use this to watch in my garage and it’s really far from my router and still had a great connection. It has a great picture and even AMAZING night vision. For 60$ I am incredibly impressed.
title: Impressive little camera (wired*)

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lorraine M
content: Quality good...can view my living from my cell phone..sharp clear picture....like this a lot better than the one I previously had set up from another company
title: Use this to replace my old security camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chris S
content: I have just about every ring product they make.  This one is very easy to use (like they all are).  Its smaller and blends in well with my white walls making it harder to know its there.  Can't say enough great stuff about Ring.  It's just so user friendly and easy compared to other cameras I have had.  Well worth the money.
title: I adore ring products

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Morgan Montgomery
content: Won’t stay connected to my WiFi. Bought 2 and after just a few weeks of use both have completely quit connecting to home WiFi. Everything else we have is working fine just these 2.
title: Crappy WiFi connectivity

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angel Puente
content: Loves these cameras. Helps me keep an eye inside my house when I’m away and check what my dogs are up too as well. Good quality picture. Was hesitate at first because me and my husband were adamant on getting wireless cameras for inside the house. But for the price we couldn’t pass up. Especially because we have the ring doorbell we thought we’d give it a try.  Very satisfied.
title: Awesome wired cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kelly Lassi
content: I am am the caregiver for my husband at home who is in hospice care.  I can do small errands and watch him on my phone.  It is calming for me at a stressful time.  Could not be happier with this purchase.
title: Setup was easy.  Picture is clear and I can pinch the view and see my husband is sleeping.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mariaj480
content: Granted it is only our first night using it, but this is great.  The picture is very clear, the sound it good and the app is easy to use.
title: Very Nice!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Donald C Crow Jr
content: Incredibly easy setup, great picture and very portable.  This simple ring product took 2 minutes to add to our existing ring products and give us a nice wide angle view of our upstairs.  I can see the video well no matter the lighting.  As an added bonus it is very easy to move from room to room if needed.
title: Easy setup

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jacob Fumerola
content: Bought this when my wife got a job so we can check in on our dog when we aren’t home. It really gives us piece of mind to see what she’s doing when we aren’t there.
title: Amazing purchase

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: malibu
content: Very happy with my purchase. We have a RING doorbell so adding this interior camera made sense. Very easy setup with great Wi-Fi connection. Motion sense is super sensitive.
title: Great Camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Larry
content: When I bought it I hooked it right up. Everything worked swell. I changed internet companies and now I cannot get it to connect to my Wi-Fi. It doesn't seem to want to work.
title: If you can get it to connect to your Wi-Fi it works pretty well

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: cra5564
content: Product works well regarding recoding motion however there were not sufficient instructions on how to get the best use of it and suddenly it started alerting me of motion on my phone app while I had it in deactivate mode. Need better instructions
title: Product does not come with sufficient instructions

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Toya
content: This is great for Viewing and Recording. It show a Very clear picture. The only problem I have is it’s connection is weak all the time. I have moved it several different places, but I get the same results. I can speak to the person but I have trouble hearing them talk back. It seems to be buffering when you try to communicate.
title: If your primary use is viewing and Recording it’s a Great product.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Marissa Casillas
content: I’ve had so many problems with this camera. It constantly disconnects and stops working and saves recordings as straight black. I reconnect it at least once a week. I have the ring doorbell and outdoor cameras as well and have no problems whatsoever so I’m not sure what’s up with this one.
title: Hardly ever works properly

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: J. K.
content: Reliable camera. Image quality is amazing and motion detection is great. Install was incredibly easy! Good price for product!
title: Great, reliable product

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jess Owens
content: Set it up on top of our fireplace and the quality is great! Catches a lot more area then I expected as well. Super impressed and might just buy another one!
title: Great quality camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ryan R.
