content: This little camera works well overall. Bought it to replace a Nest camera that was about $140 more. Works just as good and a ton cheaper. I would buy another if needed.
title: Beats Nest cam and way cheaper

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kimberly
content: Camera works well, hooks up to Ring system well but my kids don't understand a word i say when i talk to them through it. Poor sound
title: Poor sound quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kendle Ayers
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Seriously the best thing I’ve ever bought from amazon!!! There is a couple second lag but that’s to be expected. I love this camera and will be getting another one. Now I can leave my 12 year old at home while I run to the store and don’t have to worry about him! I’ve included a video of my best friend scaring my son. (I know bad mom move) This shows the night vision and audio really well.
title: You need this!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lara H.
content: The audio seems a little garbled unless you are standing right next to it talking to someone. It's nice that it doesn't need batteries
title: Small, electric, easy to relocate, good view and clear picture.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Maryah
content: Small but mighty, great range, clarity, motion detector is the best, slightest motion is detected. All around fabulous can, I highly recommend.  Also great price for feeling secure.
title: Small but mighty!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Holly
content: The background noise that resembles a white noise machine is so loud that I can barely hear someone talking right next to the camera. Awful! The outdoor spotlight cams are great but this one is horrible. Maybe I got a broken one? Would not recommend.
title: Loud background noise

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Fred J Albright
content: Got a ring doorbell as a gift. Liked it so much I bought another plus 3 ring cameras. Easy to keep an eye on places I am not physically in. Great feeling of security.
title: So easy to set up and use

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: SNikki
content: Very easy to install, the only thing I don’t like, which is the same with my floodlight cam, is that when it picks up fast movement, it locks up and takes a minute to load.
title: great easy

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TreeHugger
content: This was ridiculously quick and easy to set up. Works perfectly. I won’t hesitate to get more.
title: You can’t go wrong with Ring.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TAFY102
content: Very nice picture. Have some trouble with the zones. I only wanted certain areas to show in room. The shading comes up for the designated area, but when going live it shows the whole room. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
title: Great little picture on “live” shot any where you are!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BP
content: Until it has some sort of geo location so it has the option to turn off (for privacy reasons) when we are at home, it's useless to me. Canary cameras have had that option for years.
title: Doesn't have geo location abilities.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joseph Butler
content: Excellent camera for indoor and attaching to your ring alarm system, in case you didn't know it rain is also an Alexa activated device and that's how I set my Security system, by talking to her and I and said it by talking to her. No more fumbling with groceries to put down before you can and set your alarm
title: Best camera, connected to the best alarm system.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: WS99
content: Ring cameras provide the best alerts to the mobile devices and desktop computers. Since they do not provide constant/24/7 live view, you may not see the images when you must see them. The more costly POE Ring cameras are even more disappointments, they do not provide constant video image just like wireless Ring cameras.
title: It is the best alert system, but it is just a part-time surveillance camera.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AmazonCustomer
content: We use this with our key entry for amazon in our garage.  I like that I can also see if our garage door is closed or if I forgot to close it.
title: Good for security.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: S.768
content: Returning. The resolution isn't amazing for supposedly 1080p resolution and the wifi signal is in the red and can't penetrate 2 walls.
title: Just okay. Wifi strength needs improvement.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tanjaneka Standoak
content: I purchased this so I can check on my dog while I’m at work. This works great with my wifi and I feel better knowing I can check on my dog. I have other Ring cameras and LOVE them all.
title: Good indoor baby, dog or nanny cam

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: aardaps
content: The video and audio are excellent, and it is easy to set up and log in with the Ring app. The only thing I don't like is the lack of a way to turn off the blue light during viewing and motion recording.
title: Excellent video and audio and easy to set up and use.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Customer in Detroit
content: You can go wrong with Ring, great quality camera for the price, except you have to pay $3 month (after 30 days free) to keep your history. Sound and mic are decent quality also.
title: Great quality and easy to set up

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: microbio
content: If you want that peace-of-mind, check-in-anytime ability without breaking the bank, this is it. Easy to set up (and put away), great video (and audio), with custom settings. Highly recommend.
title: Excellent Indoor Cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JHM
content: Ready installation and it works well.  I love that it’s small too. Great addition to my ring family of products.
title: Great indoor camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Donna
content: We used the Ring single camera to monitor our grandchild. It is clear and sound is very good. Ring was purchased to replace a more expensive baby cam and Ring works great in picture and sound quality. Ring is much better than the baby monitor.
title: Excellent quality and performance 🧸

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Grace
content: The quality of the camera is wonderful but I give this 2 stars. There is no problem with my wifi connection, but it constantly makes me reconnect EVERY 3 minutes. It's been about a week and now it says there is a temporary connection problem and that they will try and hope to try resolve the issue soon. It wont connect anymore and I'm just going back and forth to check on my 2 year old daughter in the middle of the night. It's frustrating.
title: Horrible connection.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Gabe
content: I thought this would be a great camera to point out a window to see outside but I was wrong. It has a TERRIBLE glare from the window. I then thought I'd put it indoors as a discrete indoor security camera, but I was terribly wrong again because the camera has lights that flash when there's motion!  How stupid is it if someone breaks into my home then sees flashing lights because of the motion and knows exactly where the camera is??? That's not security at all. That is stupid!
title: Don't buy to point out of a window!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Takiyah
content: I love these cameras. Great buy. I like the neighbors alerts. For now I have no plan I am paying for because I use it for the kids rooms and mines.
title: Good cameras

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Christopher M. Crawford
content: Easy to set up and very clear during daytime.  IR setting is somewhat problematic at night.  Had to turn it off so that I can see at night.
title: Great security for the money!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: darlene c.
content: Everyone should have this camera in their house Gives us such peace of mind when we’re not home It nice to check up on the animals when we’re out or at work .
title: A Must have

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nicholas Hogue
content: Have nothing but good things to say about this camera. it's been great to get a better angle on my porch than what my doorbell can achieve. Great camera for the $
title: Great little camera that's versatile

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: henry driver
content: I put them in the window to look outside in the backyard, at night I cant see anything. Only works during the day
title: Its an ok camera

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ray
content: Very easy to setup.. i did not set this camera for.motion detection.. but just to keep an eye on my moms.. So with alexa  i can see my moms to check in on with her..
title: Very easy to setup.. clear pic

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Brian Paterson
content: This product has the worst night time response of any camera I've tried. The LEDs aren't nearly strong enough unless you have nightlights everywhere. Worse yet, security sucks - seriously! If you disable the camera, motion, notification, everything you can and then try "live" viewing, it will STILL RECORD. You can get onto the 'net and see what you recorded! So much for privacy!
title: Forget this product for night or privacy!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: William Mc Dougall
content: Got two plug in and one battery camera yesterday.  Battery camera is fine.  These two plug ins are useless.  The first one worked for twenty four hours and then went dead. The second one could never join the “ring” network and would not set up.  What a waste of Time and money.  Very disappointed in ring.
title: Ring Plugins Failed

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KB
content: Very pleased with how easy it was to set up and get working I have had a few issues were drops out and it still connected to Wi-Fi but then it comes back after a few hours so we’ll see if that continues.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: M4C
content: We got hacked! Warning... be careful on buying this camera. I don’t recommend this specially if you are going to put this camera inside your house. Be careful. Someone’s watching you. I am returning this and NOT buying this again.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joe A.
content: Great camera, easy setup, really like the powered model with no batteries to worry about.  And great price. Would highly recommend this camera.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Phyllis
content: Thought this camera would work in conjunction with my ring alarm system, you know when you turn the alarm system on the camera would turn on also. Ring dropped the ball on this one. UPDATE: Ring has picked up the ball. As a result of my review, Ring reached out to me to let me know that the issue I have with my indoor camera not syncing with my alarm system is in fact on there radar and a solution is being worked on as we speak. I gave three more stars for the customer service and support. will update.
title: Ring dropped the ball on this one, but now has retrieved it?

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DLG
content: These two cameras for the job! They are so crisp and clear picture you get when you watch it from your cell phone.  I’m very impressed. Ring knocked if out of the park with these cameras.
title: These are the best inside cameras around!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Queenb
content: Hacking I don’t like someone else talking to the delivery people Outdoor video 2 way speaker placed  back in the box thrown In The garage after 2 weeks use for me we wasted money to have privacy jeopardize
title: Outdoor Camera can be hacked as well

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shahrad Tadayon

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: carolina franco
content: It was ok, at first so  I was able to see the videos, but  the they did not mention that I need to pay protection or membership to continue see the videos. And it's a price for each item separately!!! Very unhappy!!!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shirley

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dakota
content: Excellent buy especially for the price. Ring does a great job!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amber Samuels
content: I have 2 other cameras just like this one and I love the ring cameras. I am giving 1 star because the camera I got has been used. The packaging was telling of this and when I went to add the camera to my ring app it stated it was already registered to a different owner. I called ring customer service and they verified this. I returned the camera and went to the store and bought one in a store. Again good camera, but not “new”!
title: Good camera, not “new”!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Drew Peterson
content: Use this to monitor my 90 yo father. Makes it easy to know if he needs anything. The motion detection works well and the audio makes communicating great without running to the room.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: PJ
content: I really am happy with Ring.  First I bought a doorbell.  Then I bought two cameras for one house.  Then I bought two cameras for another house. All good.
title: Ring makes a good product.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dennis Blake
content: PIECE OF CRAP!  Ordered a pair.  One constantly looses WiFi connection and has to be reconnected.  Now it will not reconnect at all.  The other sends false movement notices.  Now it has something "floating" around in the infrared mode.  I guess that is what gives the false readings.  Cannot even have it on at night.  Constant false motion notices.  In a vacation home.  No security from it all all.  CRAP CRAP CRAP!
title: This camera is CRAP!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Faithful Customer
content: The sound quality on this is HORRIBLE! Update November 14th Ring customer service reached out to me and sent me a replacement camera.  Now everything is good. Thank you customer service.
title: Sound Quality

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: lostincali
content: Good camera for the price, The ring app sucks and you have to keep the alert from going off every 2 to 4 hours even when it's been deactivated. Clear picture view , no complaints
title: good camara

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: local

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

content: This camera goes off and on regularly. I even bought a new router and it is approximately 2 feet from the router, doesnt matter. Totally undependable!!

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

Your better off buying a Wyze camera for half the price and you get more out of them, especially the wyze pan tilt zoom camera for only 37$

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chip

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CCorp Digital Solutions
content: This device was easily disarmed by the intruder that frequents my home, remotely. Deleted hours of recorded footage like it's set when the red light and blue light goes on, this is when he or she is in the house, and the time line has hours of missing events.. Usually between 2am and 5 am. If a kids can do this, I need to return this crap because it offers no help detaining or capturing him or her or both.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Butterfly
content: Bought 2, one for living room and one for front room to monitor activity inside my in home daycare. I will most likely purchase 2 more If I can deal with the cameras jumping off line every now and then. I can hear everything loud and clear but the people on the other end say they can barely hear me when there is noice in the rooms. At night can't make out who anyone is if they are more than 5 feet away.
title: For the price I can't complain

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KW

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

author: steven

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shep

Tech support confirmed there is no way around this... utter failure in my opinion. I bought a Netvue and was pleased to find their app lets you live stream as long as you want.

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Angela Mako
content: DO NOT BUY! I installed this indoor camera in my daughters room 4 days ago and tonight someone hacked into it and hellel at her telling her to wake the f#@$ up! product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

author: Art

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lauren

product: Ring Indoor Cam, Compact Plug-In HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TDE
content: This was very easy to setup. I read others who reviewed it and it seems like the bad reviews came on setup. I first thought the same thing when I plugged it in at the beginning. If you don’t look very careful you’ll do the same thing I did. Where you plug  it in has a small clear dust cover over it, so when you think you got it right and won’t come on Look at the device and take out the clear plastic cover and try again Bam ! It’s alive and works grest
title: Love the Ring devices  PS remember to remove the small plastic covering over the plug in
